68a3('bum): med pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa ni spor med pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni spyir med pa'o//
68a4('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ni spror med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ni spror med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni spror med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni spror med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa
68a5('bum): ni sngor med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spor med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spor med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis ni rang ni sngon
68a6('bum): med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni sbyor med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba ni spror med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spor med
68a7('bum): pa'o// sa'i khams ni spror med pa'o// chu'i khams ni spror med pa'o// me'i khams ni spor med pa'o// rlung gi khams ni spor med pa'o// nam mkha'i khams ni spor med pa'o// rnam par
68b1('bum): shes pa'i khams ni sngor med pa'o// ma rig pa ni sgor med pa'o// 'du byed ni sngor med pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o// ming dang gzug sa ni spror med pa'o// skye mched drug ni sngo
68b2('bum): med pa'o// reg pa ni spror med pa'o// tshor ba ni sprosbyor med pa'o// srang ba ni spror med pa'o// len pa ni sbyor med pa'o// srid pa ni sbyor med pa'o// skye ba ni sngor med pa'o// rga shi ni spror med
68b3('bum): ba'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyor med pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spor med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyor med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni
68b4('bum): sbyor med pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyor med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o//
68b5('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid ni sngor med pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni sder med pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni spor
68b6('bum): meng pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid ni sbyor med pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid ni sbyor med pa'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa
68b7('bum): nyid ni spror med pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni sngor med pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid ni
69a1('bum): stong pa nyid ni sngor med pa'o// dngos med pa stong pa nyid ni thor med pa'o// de bo nyid stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sgor med pa'o//
69a2('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni sngor med pa'o// yang dag par spong 'jamaH ni sngor med pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// dbang po rnams ni stor med pa'o// stobs rnams ni sto
69a3('bum): med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// 'phags pa'i 'am yan lag brgyad pa ni sbyor med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni rje
69a4('bum): me pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni spor med pa'o// gzugs meng pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni sngor med pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
69a5('bum): 'jug pa rnams ni spor med pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni spror med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnam
69a6('bum): ni sprir med pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams ni spror med pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu ni sgor med pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni spror med pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu ni spror med/
69a7('bum): pa'o// dgra bcom pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// rang byang chub ni spor med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams ni spror med pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med pa ni blor med pa'o// sangs rgyas
69b1('bum): kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba ni spor med pa'o// sems can yongs su smin par bya ba ni spror med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// mi 'jigs pa rnams ni sbyor ma/
69b2('bum): pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// byams pa chen po ni spror med pa'o// snying rje chen po ni sbyor med pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni spror med pa'o//
69b3('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba ni spror med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
69b4('bum): sgor med pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya'o// rab 'byor 'di ltar yang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do// tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med do//
69b5('bum): 'du byed pa ngo bo nyid med do// rnam par shes pa 'i ngo bo nyid med do// mig pa ngo bo nyid med do// rna ba la ngo bo nyid med do// snal ngo bo nyid med do// lce la ngo bo nyid med do// lus pa ngo bo nyid med do//
69b6('bum): yid la ngo bo nyid med do// gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do// zla la ngo bo nyid med do// dril ngo bo nyid med do// rol ngo bo nyid med do// reg la ngo bo nyid med do// chos la ngo bo nyid med do// mig
69b7('bum): rnam par shes pa la ngo ba cid med do// na pa'i rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid meng ngo do// rtswa'i rnam par shes pa la ngo banyid do// 'i rnam par shes pa lang bcid meng // lus kyi rnam par she/
70a1('bum): pa la ngo bo nyid med do// yid kyi rnam pa la ngo bo nyid med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// sna'i 'dus te
70a2('bum): reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la ngo bo nyid med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
70a3('bum): gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor
70a4('bum): ba la ngo bo nyid med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med do// sa'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do// chur
70a5('bum): khams la ngo bo nyid do// me'i khams la ngo bo nyid mang ngo // rlung gi khams la ngo bo nyid med do// nam mkha'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la ngo bo nyid med do// ma rig
70a6('bum): bu la ngo bo nyid med do// 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med do// rnam par shes pa la ngo ba nyid med do// ming dang gzugs la ngo bo nyid med do// skyen ched drug la ngo bo nyid med do// reg pa la ngo bo nyid med /
70a7('bum): tshor ba la ngo bo nyid meng ngo // sreng pa la ngo bo nyid meng ngo // len pa la ngo bo nyid med do// srid pa la ngo bo nyid med do// skye ba la ngo bo nyid med do// rga shi la ngo bo nyid med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la dza cid med do// tshul khrims kyi
70b1('bum): khol tu phyin du lango ba nyid med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do//
70b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ngo bo nyid med do// nang stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// phyi stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// skyo ba nyid dong pa nyid la ngo
70b3('bum): med do// chen po stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid 'dzi nyid podo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// mtha' las 'ad
70b4('bum): pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bo ngo nyid med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// chos
70b5('bum): thams cad stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do/
70b6('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la ngo bo
70b7('bum): nyid med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// dbang po rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// stobs rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la ngo bo nyid med do//
71a1('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la ngo bo nyid med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// bsam gtan rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// tshad
71a2('bum): med pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// rnam par thar pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug
71a3('bum): pa rnams pa ngo bo nyid med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la ngo bo nyid med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// ting /
71a4('bum): nge 'dzin rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid do// phyir
71a5('bum): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la ngo bo nyid med do// dgra bcom pa nyid la ngo bo nyid med do// rang byang chub la ngo bo nyid med do// byang chub sems dpa'i sa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// byang chub sems dpa'i
71a6('bum): skyon med pa la ngo bo nyid med do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do// sems can rnams yongs su smin par bya ba la ngo bo nyid med do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
71a7('bum): rnams la ngo bo nyid meng ngo // mi 'jigs pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// so so yang dag par rig pa rnams la ngo bo nyid med do// byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med do// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid med
71b1('bum): du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la do ba byed rnyed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid pa bsod myed du/ gang la do ba nyid meng bdon po / ba
71b2('bum): de'i phyir na gzugs ni sbyor med pa'o// tshor ba ni sngar med pa'o// radu shes ni skyon med pa'o// 'du byed ni blor med pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sbyor meng pa'o// tshig ni sber med pa'o// rnam
71b3('bum): ni med pa'i/ dz+nyAnI snror med pa'o// ljon sbyor med pa'o// lus nI sbyar med pa'o// yid ni sgor med pa'o// gzugs ni sngo med pa'o// sman spyir med pa'o// dr-ini sder med pa'o// nA~M
71b4('bum): sgor med pa'o// reg ni sngor med pa'o// chos ni sngor med pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa ni sngor med pa'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa ni spor med pa'o// rtswa'i rnam par shes pa ni spror med pa'o//
71b5('bum): blo'i rnam par shes pa ni sngor med pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa ni spor med pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ni spor med pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni d+hir med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg/
71b6('bum): pa ni sbyor med pa'o// sna'i 'dus reg pa ni sbyor med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa ni sbyor med pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa ni spor med pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni spror med pa'o//
71b7('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spor med pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spror med pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni spor med pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg
72a1('bum): gyu bya/ par can gyis tshor ban sbyor med pa'o// rdzas kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyan gyi tshor ba ni rnon ma dnga'o// yid 'dug rag du sbyin gyi byor ba ni nor mdapam
72a2('bum): lal na sa ni sor meng du// chu'i rnam pa ni rje med pa'o// sa kham pa ni sngo dang pa'o// rlung gi rgyas pa ni d+d+hi mang pag/ rnamam pa'i rnam sa na meng 'o// rnam pa gapa par/
72a3('bum): me pa'o// ma rig pa ni sngor med pa'o// 'du byed ni sgor med pa'o// rnam par shes pa ni sgor med pa'o// maung dang gzugs ni sgor myong da'o// rkyen ched drug ni sgo med pa'o// /
72a4('bum): ni smon med pa'o// tshor ba ni sbyor med pa'o// sred pa ni spor med pa'o// len pa ni spor med pa'o// zing pa ni sgor med pa'o// skye ba ni spror med pa'o// rga shi ni sbyor med pa'o// sbyin pa
72a5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyor med pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror med pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni spror med pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu dran pa ni sgor med pa'i//
72a6('bum): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni spyir med pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni sgor med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid ni sbyor med pa'o// stong pa nyid ni skor med pa'o// nang stong pa nyid na
72a7('bum): spor med pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid ni spor med pa'o// 'dus ma byas
72b1('bum): stong pa nyid na sbyor sbed ngago mtha' las 'das pa spong pazhid na sbyor byed du'o// thog ma dang tha ma med pa snod pa na tshun rnyeng pa darang mang bstod du di slong mang dag
72b2('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid na sbyar nang pa'o// chos thams cad spyod pa nyid na zer med pa'o/ 'ang gos tshun nyid stong pa 'ang ni tshun da par// mi dmigs pa stong pa 'di ni gror meng po'o// das
72b3('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ni smyon med pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni spror med pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ni sbyor med pa'o// dran panye bar gzhag pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// sa
72b4('bum): dag par spong ba rnams ni sngor med pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams ni spor med pa'o// dbang po rnams ni sgor med pa'o// stobs rnams ni spor med pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam pa ni rjong /
72b5('bum): med pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni spor med pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// bsam gtan rnams ni spor med pa'o// tshad med pa rnams ni
72b6('bum): spror med pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni sngor med pa'o// rnam par thar pa rnams ni sbyor med pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams ni spor med pa
72b7('bum): 'o/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa ni spror med pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams ni spror med pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams ni spor med pa'o//
73a1('bum): sa sa byu bar/ rdzu sgyus ba yang dag ga tu sa nga ga
73a2('bum): pag/ sa / dul rgya par smra da du
73a3('bum): rdzus shing dus su dag par gyu / sa byu rlung dag/ du
73a4('bum): rna sa ni ldan med pa'o// sa so yang dag par rig pa rnam pa ni ny-i med pa'o// thams pa cin po ni tha~M med dag/ de rje na pa ni sna da dag+ho/ spangs rgyas kyi sa 'das pa rnam
73a5('bum): ni rdzir mad pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ni sgor med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chu
73a6('bum): sems dpa'i skyon med pal 'jug go// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa stong drug brgya ba dam tho nyis brgyar baN+Dag// gsol pa ma ldan
73a7('bum): 'das gal te de ltar chos gang la'ang ngo pobad dmigs su ma mchis na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pocan thos kyi dayul lam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lagul lam/ yang dag
73b1('bum): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bshul lam// chos gang gis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar bral pa// rang 'thor byang chub sa mas
73b2('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ nyan thos kyi lam gyis byang chub sems dpa'askyon med par mi 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rang sangs rgyab kyi
73b3('bum): kham gyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par mi 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ram gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgron mang
73b4('bum): par mi 'jug gi/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ lam thams cad la bslabs shing byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// 'di lnga ste
73b5('bum): dper na brgyad pa ni chos thams cad la bslabs shing / yang dag pa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/ nam 'bras bu'i lam ma grub kyi bar du 'bras bu thob par mi byed do// rab 'byor de bzhin
73b6('bum): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang lam thams cad bsgrubaso shing / byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug ste/ nam rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin thob par ma gyur gyi bar du/
73b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi byed do// des ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu sad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//
74a1('bum): gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par dgyis te/ byang
74a2('bum): chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par bgyis nu/ bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar brgyad pa'i shul kyang gzhan rgyun du zhugs pa'i bshul kyang gzhan lan cig phyir 'ong bar
74a3('bum): zhugs pa'i bshul kyang gzhan lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i bshul kyang gzhan/ phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa'i bshul kyang gzhan phyir mi 'ong bu'i bshul kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom
74a4('bum): par zhugs pa'i bshul kyang gzhan/ dgra bcom pa'i bshul kyang gzhan/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bshul kyang gzhan/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
74a5('bum): rgyas kyi bshul kyang gzhan te/ bcom ldan 'das gal te bshul de dag gzhan dang gzhan na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshul thams cad yongs su rdzogs
74a6('bum): par bgyis te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin ma mchis par 'jug par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bshul thams cad yongs su
74a7('bum): rdzogs par bgyin/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag brgyad pa'i bshul bsgrubs shing / ngargyang par ma gyur tam// mthong ba'i bshul bsgribs shing / rgyun du zhugs
74b1('bum): bar ma gyur tam/ bsgom pa'i bshul bsgrubs shing / lan cig brir bong bar zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong bar ma gyur tam/ phyir mi 'ong bar zhugs pa 'am/ phyir mi 'ong bar/
74b2('bum): ma gyur tam/ dgra bcom par zhugs pa'am/ dgra bcom par ma gyur tam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi bshul bsgrubs shing / rang sangs rgyas su mgyur tas/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sem/
74b3('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni brgyad par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas dang skabs ma mchis te/ de ni gnas ma lags so// byang chub sems
74b4('bum): dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chung bar yang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma
74b5('bum): mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/ lan cig
74b6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/ rnam pa thams cad
74b7('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis/ byang chub sems
75a1('bum): dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis dgra bcom pa nyid thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i
75a2('bum): skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas ma mchis/ rang byang chub
75a3('bum): thob nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug pa'i gnas ma mchis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma chud par/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba
75a4('bum): gnas ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bshul thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis shing / byang chub sems pa'i sbyor ma mchis par 'ju/
75a5('bum): par 'gyur ba dang / byang chub sems dpa'i sgor ma mchis par chung nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad mang
75a6('bum): su spang bar 'gyur ba ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sems dpa' chen po brgyad par gyur
75a7('bum): tim rkun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu thob pa 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob pa 'am/ rang bya yu thob par
75b1('bum): gyu sa/ byung chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug pa'i gnas dang thabs med do// de ni gnas ma yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i ston meng par mchud par dang / rnam pa lalas dang
75b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'i gnas med do// rab 'byor 'on kyang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar 'azung ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa
75b3('bum): drug la sbed pa'i tshe/ shes pa dang mthong bas/ sa bcang ba las yongs su 'da' ste/ brgyad gang zhe na/ dkar po rnam par mthong ba'i sa dang / rigs kyis dang / brtad pa'i sa dang /
75b4('bum): mthong ba'i sa dang / bsrabs pa'i sa dang / 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sa dang / byas pa rtogs pa'i sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa ste/ sa bstan pa brgyang po 'di dag las shes pa dang
75b5('bum): mthong bas 'das nas/ 'am gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
75b6('bum): kyi ye shes kyis/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon nongs pa thams cad rab tu thong ngo // rab 'byor de la brgyad pa'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
75b7('bum): bzod pa/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i ye shes dang / spong ba'i ye shes gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang
76a1('bum): bya / yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa
76a2('bum): chen po'i bzod pa dgra bcom pa'i ye shes dang / spong ba gang yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa/ rang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes dang / spong ba gang
76a3('bum): yin pa de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa chen po ste/ de lta bas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni nyan thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi lam yongs
76a4('bum): su rdzogs par byas shing / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas rnam pa thas
76a5('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad rab tu phreng ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lam thams cad yongs
76a6('bum): su rdzogs par byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing / 'bras bu ltar sems can thams cad kyi nye bar 'tshe bar 'gyur
76a7('bum): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang nyan thos kyi bai shul dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi bshul dang / sangs rgyas kyi bshul de dag las lam gyi rnam pa shes
76b1('bum): pa nyid kyi bshul gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa bsgrub par
76b2('bum): bya ste/ de la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par dag pa ni rnam pa gang dang gang dang / tshul gang dang gang dang / mtshan ma gang dang gang gis lam du brjod pa'i rnam pa de dag dang /
76b3('bum): tshul de dag dang / mtshan ma de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya ba dang / mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ ci nas kyang
76b4('bum): gzhan gyis shes par gyur pa dang / gzhan gdul ba'i don du gzhan la brjod pa dang / bstan pa dang / bshad pa dang / gdams pa dang / rnam par dgod pa ste/ de la
76b5('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgra brnyan lta bur shes par bya ba'i don du sgra skad dang / brdar bya ba gang gis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams su go bar
76b6('bum): 'gyur ba lta bu'i sgra skad dang / brda thams cad brjod par bya/ yongs su gzung bar bya ste/ rab 'byor rnam grangs des kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ lam
76b7('bum): thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// lam thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byas na/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa rig par bya ste/ sems can dngul ba pa'i
77a1('bum): / sems can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// des kyang sems can dmyal pa'i las
77a2('bum): las kyang bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// byol song gi skye gnas kyi sems can rnams kyi byol song gi skye gnas/ kyi lam shes par bya'o//
77a3('bum): rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// des kyang byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o//
77a4('bum): gA shin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can rnams kyi gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lom shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// de las kyang gshin rje'i 'jig rten
77a5('bum): g+hi lam bzlog par bya ste/ rgyu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// 'bras bu las kyang bzlog par bya'o// mi 'am ci rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu
77a6('bum): shes par bri'o// lto 'bru chen po rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// klu rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o/
77a7('bum): 'bras bu shes par bya'o// gnod sbyin rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// mi rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bye/
77b1('bum): 'bras bu shes par bya'o// lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rku shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// tshangs pa rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras
77b2('bum): bu shes par bya'o// kun snang dang ba'i lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// dge rgyas kyi lnga rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes
77b3('bum): bar bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lanang shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// 'du shes med pa'i lha rnams kyi lam shes
77b4('bum): par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// mi che ba'i lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// mi gdung ba'i lnga
77b5('bum): rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// shin tu mthong ba'i lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o//
77b6('bum): gya nom snang ba'i lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes
77b7('bum): par bya'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// rnam shes mtha' yis skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam
78a1('bum): shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par du'o// 'bras pa
78a2('bum): shes par bya'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lha rnams kyi lam shes par bya'o// rgyu shes par bya'o// 'bras bu shes par bya'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes par bya'o//
78a3('bum): yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes par bya'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes par bya'o// dbang po lnga shes par bya'o// stobs lnga shes par bya'o// byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes par bya'o//
78a4('bum): 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes par bya'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum shes par bya'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes par bya'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes par bya'o// gzugs med
78a5('bum): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes par bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad shes par bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
78a6('bum): shes par bya'o// mi 'jig pa bzhi shes par bya'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes par bya'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes par bya'o// byams pa chen po
78a7('bum): shes par bya'o// snying rje chen po shes par bya'o// lam de dag gis kyang sems can gang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod
78b1('bum): gang lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod// gang phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ phyir ri 'ong bar
78b2('bum): 'bras bu la dgod/ gang dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ dgra bcom pa nyid la dgedagang rang byang chub la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ rang byang chub la dgod/ gang byang chub
78b3('bum): la dgod par bya ba de dag ni/ byang chub la dgod do// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid do// de dag lang bslabs shing byang chub sems
78b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams kyi bsam pa la 'jug go// sems can rnams kyi bsdam pa la zhugs nas de bzhin du chos ston to// des chos brtan pa de'ang 'bras bu med par mi
78b5('bum): 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar des gzhan gyi dbang po shin tu shes par byas pa'i phyir te/ de ni sems can rnams kyi lam dang / lam ma yin pa dang / 'chi 'pho dang /
78b6('bum): ba'ang rab tu shes so// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyad par bya ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'dir ni byang chub kyi
78b7('bum): phyogs gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos bslab par bya ba 'am/ nyan thos kyis bslab par bya ba 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis bslab par bya ba'i chos thams cad gang yang ma
79a1('bum): / 'dus pa med do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar bya chub kyi phyogs kyi chos gang lags pa dang / byang chub gang lags pa'i chos de dgra thams
79a2('bum): cad ldan pa'ang ma lags ma ldan pa'ang ma lags la/ gzugs ma mchis pa/ bstan du ma mchis pa/ thogs pa ma mchis pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gci
79a3('bum): naji ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams byang chub bsgrub par 'gyur ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das ldan pa'ang ma lags/ mi ldan pa'ang ma lags la gzugs ma mchis shing brtan
79a4('bum): du ma mchis shing / thogs pa ma mchis 'di ltar mtshan nyid ma mchis par mtshan nyid gcig pa ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am/ 'jigs par bgyid pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das
79a5('bum): 'di lta ste/ dper na nam mkha' ni chos gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am/ 'jigs par mi bgyid ngo // bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du/ rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos ni/ chos gang la'ang sgrub
79a6('bum): pa 'am 'jigs par bgyid pa ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor rang gi mtshan nyid
79a7('bum): kyis stong pa'i chos ni/ chos gang la'ang sgrub pa 'am/ 'jig pa byed pa med do// rab 'byor sems can gang rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos mi shes pa de dag gi don du/ 'di
79b1('bum): skad du 'di dag ni byang chub gi glegs kyi chos byang chub thob par byed pa'o zhes bshad kyi rab 'byor 'di ni 'di ltar gzugs gang yin pa dang tshor ba gang yin pa dang / 'du shes pang
79b2('bum): yin pa dang / 'du byed gang yid pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gang yin pa dang / rnab gang yin pa dang / snga gang yin pa dang / bre gang yin pa dang / lus pa
79b3('bum): na pa dang / yid gang yin pa dang / gzugs gang yin pa dang / rtswa gang yin pa dang / dri gang yin pa dang / ro gang yin pa dang / reg gang sbyin pa dang / chos gang yin pa dang /
79b4('bum): mig gi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / rtswa'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lce'i rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi rnam par shes pa
79b5('bum): gang yin pa dang / sing kyi rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa gang yin pa dang / sgra'i 'dus reg pa gang yin pa dang /
79b6('bum): 'i 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa gang yin pa dang / mig pa 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang
79b7('bum): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sgo'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang lus kyi
80a1('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba gang yin pa dang / sa'i khams gang yin pa dang / chu'i khams gang
80a2('bum): yin pa dang / me'i khams gang yin pa dang / rlung gi khams gang yin pa dang / nam mkha'i khams gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams gang yin pa dang / ma rig pa gang yin pa dang /
80a3('bum): 'du byed gang yin pa dang / rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang / ming dang gzugs gang yin pa dang / skye mched drug gang yin pa dang / reg pa gang yin pa dang / tshor ba gang yin pa dang /
80a4('bum): pa gang yin pa dang / len pa gang yin pa dang / sring pa gang yin pa dang / skye ba gang yin pa dang / rga shi gang yin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi
80a5('bum): rob tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang / bsam+b+ha gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gang yin pa dang
80a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu sbyin pa gang yin pa dang / nang rjong pa nying gang yo pa dang / d+hi stong bzod gang yin pa dang / byi nang stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / slo po cing stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang /
80a7('bum): chen po stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / 'du byas stong pa nyid bang yin pa dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mtha' las 'das pa
80b1('bum): stong pa nyid kyang yin pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / chos thams cad rto
80b2('bum): pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang
80b3('bum): yin pa dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan dang po gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gnyis pa gang yin pa dang / bsam gtan gsum pa gang yin pa
80b4('bum): dang bsam gtan bzhi pa gang yin pa dang / byams pa gang yin pa dang / snying rje gang yin pa dang / dga' ba gang yin pa dang / btang snyoms gang yin pa dang / nam mkha' mtha'
80b5('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang
80b6('bum): yin pa dang / 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa gang yin pa dang / dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams gang yin pa dang / yang dag par spong ba rnams gang yin
80b7('bum): ba dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams gang yin pa dang / dbang po rnams gang yin pa dang / stobs rnams gang yin pa dang / byang chub kyi yan lag rnams gang yin pa dang / 'phags
81a1('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa gang yin pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum gang yin pa dang / rnam par thar pa
81a2('bum): brgyad gang yin pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang yin pa dang // mngon par shes pa rnams gang yin pa dang / ting nge 'dzin rnams gang yin pa dang / gzungs kyi
81a3('bum): sgo rnams gang yin pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu gang yin pa dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang yin pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
81a4('bum): 'dres pa bco brgyad gang yin pa dang / byams pa chen po gang yin pa dang / snying rje chen po gang yin pa dang / rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang
81a5('bum): yin pa dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu gang yin pa dang / dgra bcom pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rang byang chub gang yin pa dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid gang yin pa dang / rnam pa
81a6('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni/ chos dang 'dul ba 'di la ldan pa'ang ma yin/ mi ldan pa'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bstan du med pa thogs
81a7('bum): pa med pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig kyang / de dag la de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams bzung bar bya ba'i don du/ 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis de skad du brjod de/
81b1('bum): don dam par ni ma yin no// de dag thams cad la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes pa dang mthong bas bsgrub par bya ste/ ji lta ba bzhin du shes pa dang mthong bas bsgrubs nas
81b2('bum): chos la la ni mngon du bya'o// la la ni mngon du mo bya'o// de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du bya/ chos gang ni shes pa dang
81b3('bum): mthong bas bslabs te mngon du mi bya zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ni shes pa dang mthong bas bslabs te mngon du mi bya'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis chos
81b4('bum): thams cad rnam pa thams cad du mngon du bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab
81b5('bum): par bya'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'phag pa'i chos dang 'dul ba/ 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bgyi ba de/ ji tsam gyis na 'phags pa'i chos dang 'dul
81b6('bum): ba zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la nyan thos rnams dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /
81b7('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams ni 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ zhe sdang dang ldan pa'ang ma yin
82a1('bum): bral ba'ang ma yin/ gti mug dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'jigs tshogs su lta ba dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ dral ba'ang ma yin/ the tsom
82a2('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs bsnyems pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod
82a3('bum): sems dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin te/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
82a4('bum): thal ba'ang me yin/ ma rig pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ nga rgyal dang / rgod pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ bsam gtan dang po dang ldan pa'ang
82a5('bum): ma yin/ thal ba'ang ma yin/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ desam gtan gsum pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal ba'ang na sbyin/ bsam
82a6('bum): rangani pa dang lda pa' mang/ byayang sa med rnams pa dang ldan 'dus yin/ rnal pa 'jamaman/ snying rdza dang ldan pa'angan darnal pa mtshan/
82a7('bum): bdang ldan pa'ang maman rngam dpang mdza bcang stongs dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal ba'ang ma yin/ rnam mapa ma pa mas kyi med la goms par 'jug pa dang lda
82b1('bum): 'ang ma yin/ dral pa'ang ma yin/ rnam shes mtha' skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin// bral ba'ang ma yin/ cung zad med pa'i sku mched la snyoms par 'jug pa/
82b2('bum): dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal ba'ang me yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
82b3('bum): pa bzhi dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ ngal nga'ang ma yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yon/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral pa/
82b4('bum): 'ang ma yin tedabang po lnga dang ldan pa'ang sa yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ stobs sde dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal ba'ang ma yin/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/
82b5('bum): thal ba'ang ma yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang mA yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang ldan pa 'du ma yin/ zil ba'ang ma yin/
82b6('bum): bsam gtan bzhi dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal ba'ang ma yin/ tshad med pa bzhi dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang ldan
82b7('bum): nga'ang ma yod / thal ba 'ang ma yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'angs yin mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang ldan pa'angs yin te/
83a1('bum): bya bya/
83a2('bum): zam pa'angs yin/ rnam par bar pa gyi spyong pa nyid dang / mtshanam meng pa dang / rlor pa madru pa dang lta bar dz+nyAn/ thab pa ngam dzun/ mngon bar
83a3('bum): shes bsdu dang ldan pa 'dum nyin ngal ba'angs yin/ nge 'dzin rnamapa dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ da sa yin/ gzungs kyi stornanapa dang na par /
83a4('bum): nga ma skyedade bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu da ldan pa'angam yin bal pa'ang ba 'an ma 'dzags pa bzhi ngan pa mtshan dag pangangs yin
83a5('bum): dag par ris pa pa'i dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal pa 'ang ma sbyin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo rgyang dang ldan pa'ang matsun rnam parang sa smin/ bya ba pacan po dang /
83a6('bum): ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin/ snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'ang sa sbyin rdul ba'ang ma yin/ 'dus byas ky-i khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin thal da'ang ma yin/
83a7('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams dang ldan pa'ang ma yin/ bral ba'ang ma yin de'i phyir de dag ni 'phags pa zhes bya ste/ 'di ni de dag gi chos dang 'dul ba yin pas de'i dring
83a8('bum): 'phagra pa'i chos dang 'dul ba zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag thams cad gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa 'di ltad
83b1('bum): mtshan nyid med par mtshan gcig pa ste de dag ni gzugs med pa dang / gzugs med par ldan pa'ang ma yin thal ba'ang ma yin no// bskrun du med pa dang /
83b2('bum): bstan du med par ldan pa'ang ma yin bral ba'ang ma yin no// thogs pa med pa dang thogs pa med par ldan pa'ang ma yin/ thal pa'ang ma yin no// mtshan
83b3('bum): nyid med pa dang mtshan nyid med par ldan pa'ang ma yin / bral babang ma yin no// rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi gzugs med pa/
83b4('bum): bathun du med pa thogs pa med pa mnan nyid gtsug pa mtshan nyid med pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'i/ gang la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos del
83b5('bum): bsgrub par bya'o// des de la bsgrubastan chos kyi mtshan nyi gang yang dmigs par sna 'gyur ro// rab 'byor gyis gsod pa dacos ldan 'das kyi na
83b6('bum): dazugs kyisar ny-id la bslal par mi bgyi'as raba'i mtshan nyi la bamabu par ma bci'am 'dugs kyi mtshan nyid lnga bsgrub par mo bgyi sa 'a byed kyi sa
83b7('bum): brdza ba ma pa la rnam par gas pa'i macan med la bsla' par mi bgyilas tshig gi can pa 'thab par mi batshal/ na pa'i mcham rnal sa
84a1('bum): ma rtswa'i tshan da pa bslab par mi dz+dza ma/ lnga stanan d+gal bsgrub par nI bad+mA rA/ zlus kyi margyan das bzla pa / da ma pa
84a2('bum): pa sgrub par mi bgyi'am/ gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi 'am/ d+h+rU'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi / dri'i mtshan da pa bslab par mi bgyil/ ro mtshan tho la ban
84a3('bum): ngar mi bgyi 'am/ reg gi mtshan nyid la bsgrub par maM bzhi 'am/ chos kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rna ba'i rnam
84a4('bum): par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ lus kyi rnam
84a5('bum): par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'amamig gi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ rna ba'i 'dus
84a6('bum): te reg pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bag+h+nAM 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am lce'i 'dus te rig pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ lus kyi 'dus
84a7('bum): te reg pa'i mtshan nid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i mtshad nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
84b1('bum): 'am rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi dgyi 'am/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i sbyin gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mA~M baTI 'am/
84b2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
84b3('bum): rkyen gyis tshor ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sa'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am chu'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ ni'i khams kyi
84b4('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rlung gi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ nam mkha'i khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi
84b5('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ ma rig pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par
84b6('bum): mi bgyi 'am/ ming dang gzugs kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ skye mched drug gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ reg pa'i mtshan nyid la mi sgrub par mi bgyi 'am/ tshor ba'i
84b7('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sad pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am len pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ srid pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
85a1('bum): 'am skye ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bab+hi Sh+Tam/ rga shi'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi badz+rI 'am/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi
85a2('bum): 'am tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi 'gyu/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa raM/
85a3('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'amabasam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
85a4('bum): 'amanang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am phyi stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/
85a5('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am chen po stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ don dam pa stong nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi
85a6('bum): bgyi 'am/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
85a7('bum): nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am / khog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi
85b1('bum): sa rang bzhin stong banyid kyimatshan nyid la bsgrub par mi gyi chos thams cad stong pa mtshan nyid la bsgrub par ba bya gyi ma / rlung gis nga spyod byu
85b2('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bsdu 'am/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi'am/ dngos po med pa stod pa nyid kyi mtshan dang la brlab padu ma bgyi 'am/
85b3('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bzla 'am/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ca nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ bsam gtan dang po'i mtshan nyid pa
85b4('bum): bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am bsam gtan gsum pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am
85b5('bum): bsam gtan bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am byams pa chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am
85b6('bum): dga' ba chen po'i mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi 'am btang snyoms chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ nAm mkhar mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug
85b7('bum): pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms
86a1('bum): chu na du smrasnya ltan
86a2('bum): na na
86a3('bum): sa sas du
86a4('bum): sa su su
86a5('bum): ma rgyun gas du ga ga du sa
86a6('bum): sgyu du sa du bya
86a7('bum): ma sa la / nga ma kyi
86b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stongs rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslad par ni brdzi 'am/ 'jigs pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bsgri' so so yang dag par rig pa rnams
86b2('bum): mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ byams pa chen po'i mtshan nying la bslab par ma bgyi'
86b3('bum): snying rje chen po'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi 'gyi 'am kun 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi rgya
86b4('bum): ma 'gog pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi'am/ lam gyi mtshan nyid la bsgrub par mi bgyi'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa'i mtshon nyi la bslang bar mi bgyi 'am rten cing
86b5('bum): 'brel par 'byung ba lugs dang 'thun pa dang / lugs dang mi mthun pa'i mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am 'dus byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am
86b6('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi khams kyi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi 'am bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag gi mtshan nyid la bslab par mi bgyi na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang
86b7('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang / 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid la bslabs te/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'da' bar 'gyur/ nyan
87a1('bum): thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par 'jug par 'gyur/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la
87a2('bum): ma zhugs na/ ji ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyurarnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma thob na/ ji ltar chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bgyi/ chos kyi 'khor
87a3('bum): ma bskor na/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi theg pa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 'am theg pa chen pos sems can rnams 'khor ba las dkrol bar bgyi/ bcom ldan
87a4('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor gal te chos la la zhig la mtshan nyid yad na ni/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mtshan nyid de la bslab par yang 'gyur na/
87a5('bum): chos thams cad la mtshan nyid rnyed cing bzugs med/ bstan du mad/ thogs pa med pa 'di ltar ma chun med par mtshan nyid dacig bstan/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa'
87a6('bum): brim pa dang chen pos rgyanan nyi da gang ba sgrung pa d+ha mtshan nyid meng par 'ang brlab par mthu'o/ do dri na na/ na cad rgyun nyid med par 'gyur ba ma thos pa
87a7('bum): nyid yod par gyur pa ma mi gyi/ rab 'byor chos 'di dag ni ldan chad kyang mtshan nyid med la/ dbur yang mtshan cing ming pas na/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
87b1('bum): pos mtshan nyid la'ang bslab par mi bya/ mtshan nyid med par yang bsgrub par mi bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung / de bzhin gshegs pa
87b2('bum): rnams mA drung yang rung ste/ mtshan nyid med pa'i dbyings 'di ni de bzhin du gnas pa'o// gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad la mtshan nyid ma mchi shi/
87b3('bum): mtshan nyid tha dad pa'i ngam lags natshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma lags na/ de ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ma mchis
87b4('bum): bar 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa ma bsgoms par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las
87b5('bum): 'da' bar mi nus so// nyan thos kyi sa dang / rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las ma 'das par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byung chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis
87b6('bum): par 'jug par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs par ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa po skyed par mi
87b7('bum): nus so// ma skye ba'i chos la bzod pa ma bskyed par ni mngon par shes pa bsgrub par mi nus so// byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa ma brngubs par ni ra
88a1('bum): rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang / sems can yongs su smin par bgyi bar mi nus so// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang / sems can
88a2('bum): yongs su smin par ma bgyis par ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par mi nus so// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par ma bgyis par ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar
88a3('bum): mi nus so// chos kyi 'khor lo ma bskor bar ni/ sems can rnams rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la dgod par mi nus so//
88a4('bum): phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras du la dgod par mi nus so// dgra bcom pa nyid la dgod par mi nus so// rang byang chub la dgod par mi nus so// bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung
88a5('bum): chub la dgod par mi nus so// sems can rnams sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// tshul khrims las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos
88a6('bum): po la dgod par mi nus so// bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po la dgod par mi nus so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de de bzhin no//
88a7('bum): de de bzhin te/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan nyid med pa ste/ mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang ma yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin no// gsol pa de ltar
88b1('bum): chos thams cad mtshan nyid ma mchis na ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom par 'gyurabacom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa'
88b2('bum): sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa'ang sa yin/ mtshan nyid gcig pa'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor mtshan nyid med pa bsgom pa ni/
88b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol pa/ de ji ltar na mtshan nyid ma mchis pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
88b4('bum): bsgom par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gsol ba
88b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das de ji ltar chos thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bzus
88b6('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du shes
88b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bzlas pa'o// rnam par
89a1('bum): shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgos pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa/
89a2('bum): bsgom pa'o// rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna rnam par bzhim pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
89a3('bum): pa'o// lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
89a4('bum): yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
89a5('bum): zla rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa nA~M/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin bu brtson pa'o// ro rnam
89a6('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos
89a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
89b1('bum): du'o// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa nishes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// su'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
89b2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom
89b3('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgon pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig zi
89b4('bum): 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
89b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
89b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par
89b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90a1('bum): bsgom pa'o// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sna'i 'dus te/
90a2('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
90a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yid kyi 'dus
90a4('bum): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
90a5('bum): pa'o// chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
90a6('bum): pa'o// rlung gi khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
90a7('bum): bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes
90b1('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha
90b2('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
90b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab
90b4('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sred pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
90b5('bum): pa bsgom pa'o// len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// zed pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom
90b6('bum): pa'o// skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rga shaM rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
90b7('bum): blang ba rnam par bsgom par skem pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan dang po
91a1('bum): rnam par dzes pa tshul rdzus pa sa / smu na sas sa tha~M
91a2('bum): ba bsgom bya'o// bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi la rol tu phyin pa pasgom pa'o// bamam spyangan pani brnam par ngaskor pa bstom pade
91a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgos pa'o// byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rob tu gyur pa bsgom pa'o// phreng rje rnam par 'arlom pa 'asgom pani/ gas sna
91a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa naM/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
91a5('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa sgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu rten pa sgom pa'o// rnam shes mtha'
91a6('bum): sa rje marjod kyi goms par 'jug pa rnam par 'arnam pa bsdum pa ni/ shes rab kyi rol tu sbyin pa bstom du'o// cung zangad med pa'i banyid kyi goms par brtag pa rnam par sho
91a7('bum): kha rnam pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'i// 'du shes med 'du shes meng min gyi mched kyi goms par 'jug pa rnam par sdom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi ro//
91b1('bum): tu byin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyam rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu zin pa bsgom pa'o// chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom par rtog na/
91b2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par
91b3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gtong ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra rjes su
91b4('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
91b5('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab
91b6('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa po sgom pa'o// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
91b7('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag med pa'i 'a
92a1('bum): bya bya/ shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu/
92a2('bum): byin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
92a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sems can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// srog gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa
92a4('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skye ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gso ba'i 'du shes
92a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// skyes bu'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
92a6('bum): gang zag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed can gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
92a7('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shed bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byed pa po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgo//
92b1('bum): ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// tshor ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes pa po'i 'du shes/
92b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mthong ba po'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
92b3('bum): pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bde ba'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
92b4('bum): sdug pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bdag gi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
92b5('bum): bsgom pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes
92b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dbang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
92b7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu byon pa bsgom pa'o// stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// byang chub kyi yan lag rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
93a1('bum): byu bya/ pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid
93a2('bum): kyai ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93a3('bum): smin pa bsgom pa'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
93a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa dang
93a5('bum): bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med pa dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom
93a6('bum): pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom/
93a7('bum): pa'o// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa
93b1('bum): bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'bog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgos pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// laH
93b2('bum): 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sdug bsngal gas pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
93b3('bum): blun pa bsgom pa'o// kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgon pa'o// 'gob pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
93b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
93b5('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos shes pa rnam par bsgom
93b6('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// kun rdzob shes
93b7('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sgra
94a1('bum): bya bya/ ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
94a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgos pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
94a3('bum): pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
94a4('bum): bsgom pa'o// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
94a5('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
94a6('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom
94a7('bum): pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par
94b1('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgos pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
94b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o//
94b3('bum): thog ma dang a med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol
94b4('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/
94b5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par
94b6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong
94b7('bum): ba nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
95a1('bum): pa'o// mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgo
95a2('bum): pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
95a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// so so yang dag par
95a4('bum): rig pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
95a5('bum): bsgom pa'o// byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// snying rje chen po rnam par bsgos pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
95a6('bum): bsgom pa'o// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong bar 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni
95a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// das bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgos pa
95b1('bum): bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa nI/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam
95b2('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// bag
95b3('bum): chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ni/ shes rab kyi pha ro tu phyin pa bsgom pa'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom
95b4('bum): ldan 'das ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
95b5('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
95b6('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
95b7('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol
96a1('bum): / tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
96a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gzugs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
96a3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sgra rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dri rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
96a4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ro rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na reg rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
96a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgon pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa/
96a6('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rna ba'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna
96a7('bum): rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lce'i rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
96b1('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
96b2('bum): bsgos pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mig gi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom parashes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ shA nan
96b3('bum): ba'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ dzA ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu
96b4('bum): zin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar nA lce'i 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa
96b5('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
96b6('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom
96b7('bum): pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol du napa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyos tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa las/
97a1('bum): ji ltar na lho'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi 'dus te reg
97a2('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
97a3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na chu'i khams rnam par bsgom pa
97a4('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na me'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rlung gi khams
97a5('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
97a6('bum): ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i khams rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
97a7('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na ma rig pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi phas phyin pa bcom pa lagra/ ji ltar na 'du byed rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab
97b1('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam par shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ming dang gzugs rnam par bsgom pa
97b2('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu dran pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye mched drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar ni reg pa rnam par
97b3('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshor ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sred pa rnam par
97b4('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na len pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa gas/ ji ltar na srid pa rnam par
97b5('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skye ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rga shi rnam par
97b6('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na blang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba rnam par
97b7('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan dang po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na bsam
98a1('bum): gtan gnyis pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na bsam gtan gsum pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab/
98a2('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na bsam gtan bzhi pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na byams pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
98a3('bum): pa rna shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na snying rje rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dga' ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom
98a4('bum): pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na btang snyoms rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nam mkha' mtha' yas skye
98a5('bum): mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa sgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa
98a6('bum): bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsngos
98a7('bum): pa lags/ ji ltar na 'du shes meng 'du shes meng min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sangs rgyas rjes su
98b1('bum): dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos rjes su dran pa rnam par bathom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'ang/
