98b2('bum): ji ltar na dge 'dun rjes su dran pa rnam par dasgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ga shes
98b3('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stong pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'grus/ ji ltar na lnga rjes su dran pa rnam par
98b4('bum): bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na skye ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
98b5('bum): dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na 'chi ba rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes
98b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lus kyi rnam pa rjes su dran pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi rtag pa'i 'du
98b7('bum): shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsdug bsngal gyi 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsdom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
99a1('bum): pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na bdag med pa'i 'du shes rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na mi sdug pa'i 'du
99a2('bum): shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
99a3('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na sems can gyi 'du shes pa rnam
99a4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na srog gi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
99a5('bum): lags/ ji ltar na bye ba'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gso ba'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
99a6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na skyes bu'i 'du shes pa rnam pa bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na gang zag
99a7('bum): gi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed can gyi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol
99b1('bum): tu byin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shed bdag gi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na byed pa po'i 'du shes pa
99b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na tshor ba po'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom
99b3('bum): pa lags ji ltar na shes pa po'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na mthong ba po'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa
99b4('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rtag pa'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar
99b5('bum): na bde ba'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na sdug pa'i 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha
99b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bdag gi 'du shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnam
99b7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na yang dag par spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagra/
100a1('bum): ji ltar ma rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bcom pa lags/ ji ltar na dbang po rnam par bsgom pa brnam pa
100a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na stobs rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ dzaM ltar na byang chub kyi yan la ba rnam
100a3('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na lam rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar
100a4('bum): na stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
100a5('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lagasaji ltar na rnam
100a6('bum): par thar pa brgyad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
100a7('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa la/
100b1('bum): ji ltar na rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin
100b2('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na bsdub bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
100b3('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgrim pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam/
100b4('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam 'phags pa'i bden pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa
100b5('bum): lags/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na kun 'byung ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
100b6('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na 'gog pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na lam shes pa rnam
100b7('bum): par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na zad pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
101a1('bum): / ji ltar na mi skye ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chos shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes
101a2('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rjes su 'gro ba shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na kun rdzob shes pa
101a3('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dris pa shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags
101a4('bum): ji ltar na sgra ji bzhin shes pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab
101a5('bum): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bzod pa'i pha rol tu
101a6('bum): byin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
101a7('bum): pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101b1('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/
101b2('bum): ji ltar na byi stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ dri ltar na byi nang stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101b3('bum): bsgom pa lags ji ltar na stong pa nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na chen po stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa
101b4('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na don dam pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na 'dus byas stong
101b5('bum): pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
101b6('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar na thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid
101b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dor ba med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa ra/
102a1('bum): ji rdzu na rang bzhin stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa bsgob pa lags ji ltar na chos thams cad stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa
102a2('bum): bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
102a3('bum): mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
102a4('bum): bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa ka shes
102a5('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mngon par shes pa drug rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na ting nge 'dzin thams cad rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
102a6('bum): shes rab kyi pa rab tu sbyin pa bsgom pa lag sa ji gar na brdungs pa thams cad rnam par bsgom pa sgom ba ga shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs pa
102a7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na
102b1('bum): pos mang dag par rig pa pa'i rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ de ltar na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnam par bzlos pa bsgom pa / shes rab kyi b.ro /
102b2('bum): byin pa bsgom pa 'gas/ ji ltar na byams pa chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na snying rje chen po rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pharol
102b3('bum): tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na lan cig d+hir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par
102b4('bum): bcom pa sgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa 'gas
102b5('bum): ji ltar na da gA bcom pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na rang byang chub rnam par bsgom pa bsgos pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu
102b6('bum): byin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ ji ltar na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'id
102b7('bum): rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags ji ltar na ngag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba rnam par bsgom pa bsgom pa/
103a1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa lags/ shes rab kyi pha rob tu phyin pa stong brag brgyab bar po 'os brgyar dgug/
103a2('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba rab 'byor 'di'i byang chub sems dpa' rnon po shes rab kyi pha rab tu phyin pa ga spyod de'i tshe gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mo bsgom mo//
103a3('bum): tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces
103a4('bum): bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bskon mo// rna ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lde dngos po yod ces
103a5('bum): bya bar mi bsgrim no// lus dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ming dngos po yod ces rgyu bar mi bsgon no// gzugs dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bla dngos po
103a6('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dri dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ro ngo ba yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// reg dngos po yod ces bya bar mi brtson mo// chos
103a7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
103b1('bum): rtswa'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sgo'i rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya
103b2('bum): bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// myig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te/
103b3('bum): reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtswa'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
103b4('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po sod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
103b5('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher ba dngos po yod
103b6('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tsher rab dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi 'dus te rib pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar
103b7('bum): mi bsgom mo// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sa'i khams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chu'i khams dngos po yod
104a1('bum): sa bya bar mi bsgos mo// me'i bams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom no// rlung gi 'ams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi tsun no// sangs kwa'i khams da/
104a2('bum): bo sod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa'i dngos po yod nas bya bar mi sgom mo// rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi sgom mo// ma rig pa dngos po
104a3('bum): yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du byed dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ming dang bzugs dngos po yod cesaH
104a4('bum): bur mi bsgom mo// skye mched drug dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// reg pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshor rab dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
104a5('bum): skyed pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi po sgom mo// len pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sring pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skye ba dngos po yod ces d+ha bar
104a6('bum): mi bsgom mo// rga shi dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bskon no// blang ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dor ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan dang po dngos po yod/
104a7('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gnyis pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan gsum pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bsam gtan bzhi pa dngos
104b1('bum): bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// byams pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// snying rje dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dga' ba dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
104b2('bum): mo/ btang snyoms dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// na mu mkha'i mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam shes mthara'
104b3('bum): yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'du shes
104b4('bum): med 'du shes med min bye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos rjes su
104b5('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
104b6('bum): gtong ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lha rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skyo ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
104b7('bum): mo// dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'chi ba rjes su dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lus kyi rnam pa rjes su
105a1('bum): dran pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya
105a2('bum): bar mi bsgom mo// bdag med pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa'i 'du shes dngos
105a3('bum): bo sod ces bya bar mi rno mo// dadug pa 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sems can 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// thob gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces
105a4('bum): b+ha bar mi bsgom mo// skye ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// gas pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// skyes bu'i 'dra shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
105a5('bum): dgom mo// gang zag gi 'du shes dngos po yong ces bya bar mi brtson no// sheng ban gyi du shes dngos po spyong ces bya bar mi brtson mo// sheng bdag gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces
105a6('bum): bur mi bsgom mo// bye pa po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom so// tshor ba ba'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// shes pa po'i 'du shes dngos po
105a7('bum): ces bya bar mi thos so// mthong ba po'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi nom so// rtam pa'i 'dushes dngos pa sod ces bya par ma ma mo// bang pa'i 'dugs pa
105b1('bum): bo yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug pa'i 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// bdug gi 'du shes dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dran pa nye bur gzhag pa
105b2('bum): rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// yang dag par spong ba rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rdzu 'phrul mi rkang pa rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
105b3('bum): dbang po rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stobs rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// lam
105b4('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
105b5('bum): smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam par thar pa brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu
105b6('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces
105b7('bum): bya bar mi bsgom mo// rtog pa med cing dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi
106a1('bum): 'gog pa 'phags pa'i bden pa dngos po yod ces bya bar na
106a2('bum): bya/ bsgom mo// kun 'byung ba 'phags pa'i badren pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
106a3('bum): sa pa'i na pa dus pa 'dus ban pa// lung ba nas pa sa pa spyo sa ma sa / 'byud shes pang
106a4('bum): bsgom mo//
106a5('bum): sa rnamasal sa kyi slong sa rnam/ da kyimyig
106a6('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo/
106a7('bum): rjes su 'gro ba shes pa dngos po yod ces
106a8('bum): bya bar mi bsgom no// mi skye ba shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos shes pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom /
106a9('bum): nga / sa nga / sa sa
106a10('bum): ma / ma ma pa
106a11('bum): phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
106b1('bum): mi bsgom mo// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// phyi stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces
106b2('bum): bya bar mi bsgom mo// phyi nang stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chen po stong pa nyid dngos po yong
106b3('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// don dam pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dus byas stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// 'dus ma byas stong pa
106b4('bum): nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar gyi
106b5('bum): bsgom mo// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang bzhin stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// chos thams cad stong pa nyid dngos po yod/
106b6('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rang gi mtshan nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mo bsgom mo// dngos po med pa stong pa nyid
106b7('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo//
107a1('bum): mngon par shes pa drub dngos pa yod ces bya byur mi bsgom mo// ti nge 'dzin pasu rung dngos po spyod ces bya bar myi bsgom no// gzungs kyi stornams du
107a2('bum): dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dngos po yong ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// mi 'jigs pa bzhi dngos po yod ces bya bar mo bsgos mo// sos
107a3('bum): yang dag par rab pa b+ha nI dngos po yod ces bya bar ni bsgom mo// sang sa rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bskon mo// byams bachen po dngos po yod
107a4('bum): ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// snying rje chen po dngos po spyod ces bru bar mo bsgom mo// rgyun du zhugs par 'bras bu dngos po yod nus zla bar mi bsgom mo// kun gyis hU~Mr 'ong ba'i
107a5('bum): 'bras bu dngos po yod ces bya bar myi bsgom mo// b+hir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dngos po yod cesa~M bya bar mi bsgom mo// dgra bcom pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgris mo// 8
107a6('bum): byang chub dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgrim mo// lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom
107a7('bum): mo/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa dngos po yod ces bya bar mi bsgom mo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'dra
107b1('bum): shes can la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgos pa med do// dngos por 'du shes can la brtson/
107b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
107b3('bum): pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la
107b4('bum): b+hi stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can+da la phyi nang stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la stong pa nyid myong ba nyid ba sgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
107b5('bum): shes can la chen po stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la don ngas pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus byas stong pa nyid bsgom
107b6('bum): ba med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos
107b7('bum): po'i 'du shes can la thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dor ba med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang
108a1('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la chos thams cad stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang gi mtshan nyid
108a2('bum): stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'dus shes can la dngos po med pa stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du/
108a3('bum): shes can la ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid bsgom pa med do dngos po'i 'du shes can la mngon par shes pa
108a4('bum): drug bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la ting nge 'dzin thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes
108a5('bum): can la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la mi 'jigs pa bsgom pa meng ngo // dngos po'i 'du shes can la so so yang dag par rig pa bsgom pa med ngo //
108a6('bum): dngos po'i 'du shes can la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la byams pa chen po bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la snying rje chen po
108a7('bum): bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po
108b1('bum): 'du shes can la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la dgra bcom pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rang byang chub bsgom pa med
108b2('bum): dro/ dngos po'i 'du shes can la lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid bsgom pa med do// dngos po'i 'du shes can la rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid bskum pa med do// dngos po'i 'du
108b3('bum): shes can la bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba bsgom pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de dngos po la// 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar
108b4('bum): mtha' gnyis la chags te/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam+b+ha gtan dang / shes rab dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / b+hi stong pa
108b5('bum): nyid dang / byi nang stong pa nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid
108b6('bum): dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thob ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid
108b7('bum): dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
109a1('bum): dung / mngon par shes pa drub dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / bzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang
109a2('bum): mi 'jibs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / rdzun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
109a3('bum): bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dang / rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
109a4('bum): pa nyid dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spang ba la/ 'di ni bdag go zhes bya bar mtha' gnyis la chags par gyur pas/ gang mtha' gnyis la chags pa de la ni
109a5('bum): thar pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor dngos po'i 'du shes can la ni/ sbyin pa'ang med/ tshul khrims kyang med/ bzod pa'ang med/ brtson 'grus kyang med
109a6('bum): bsam gtan yang med/ shes rab kyang med/ lam yang med/ ye shes kyang meng/ 'thob pa'ang med/ mngon par rtogs pa'ang med/ 'thun pa'i bzod pa'ang med/ gzugs
109a7('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes
109b1('bum): pa med/ mig kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'ang yongs su shes pa myed/ lce'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyang yongs su shes pa med/ yid
109b2('bum): kyang yongs su shes pa med/ gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ klu'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dri'ang yongs su shes pa med/ ro'ang yongs su shes pa med// reg kyang yongs
109b3('bum): su shes pa med chos kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mig gri rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'ang
109b4('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med lus kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med yid kyi rnam par shes pa'ang yong su shes pa med/
109b5('bum): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'ang
109b6('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyi tshor ba'ang
109b7('bum): yongs su shes pa med/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lce'i 'dus te reg
110a1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
110a2('bum): tshor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sa'i khams yongs su shes pa med/ chu'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ me'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rlung gi khams kyang yongs su
110a3('bum): shes pa med/ nam mkha'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ ma rig
110a4('bum): pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du byed kyang yongs su shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ ming dang gzugs kyang yongs su shes pa med/ skye mched drug kyang

110a6('bum): pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ skye ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ rga shi'i nga yongs su shes pa med/ blang ba'ang yongs su shes pa med/ dor ba'ang yongs su shes pa med bsam
110a7('bum): gtan dang po'ang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan gsum pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'ang yongs su
110b1('bum): shes pa med byams pa 'ang yongs su shes pa med/ snying rje bang yongs su shes pa med dpa' ba'ang yongs su shes bya med/ btang snyoms kyang yongs su shes pa med rnam

110b3('bum): pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran

111a1('bum): byabya/ pa med/ dngos po med pa'i 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ bdag gi 'du shes kyang yongs su shes pa med/ sems can gyi 'du shes kyang yongs

112a1('bum): nga bya bya/ shes pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su shes pa med/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'ang yongs su shes pa med

112b1('bum): cing stong pa nyid kyang yongs su shes pa med/ mngon par shes pa drug kyang yongs su shes pa med/ ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyang yongs su dashes pa med/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad kyang song /

112b7('bum): po mchis shes bgyi ba ni ci legs dngos po ma mchis shes bgyi ba ni ci lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gnyis ni dngos po yod pa'o// mi gnyis pa ni dngos
113a1('bum): po med pa'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gnyis shes bgyi ba ni ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi 'du shes
113a2('bum): ni gnyis so// tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// 'du byed kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rnam par shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'du

113b1('bum): so// du yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i 'du shes na

115a1('bum): kyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// byang chub kyi yan lag gi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// lam gyi 'du shes kyi 'du shes ni gnyis po// stong pa nyid kyi

115b1('bum): 'dris pasheb pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis s+ho// sgra ji bzhin shes pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'du shes ni gnyis so// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i 'byes

115b6('bum): med pa stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni gnyis so// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid kyi 'du shes ni

122b5('bum): shes par 'du shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / lce'i 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang /
122b6('bum): lus kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang yid kyi 'dus te reg par 'du shes pa dang / mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor
122b7('bum): bar 'du shes pa dang / sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes
123a1('bum): pa dang / yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / sa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / chu'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / me'i khams su 'du shes pa
123a2('bum): dang / rlung gi khams su 'du shes pa dang / nam mkha'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa'i khams su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod chags su 'du shes pa dang / 'dod chags spang bar 'du
123a3('bum): shes pa dang / zhe sdang du 'du shes pa dang / zhe sdang spang bar 'du shes pa dang / gti mug tu 'du shes pa dang / gti mug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ma rig par 'du shes pa dang / ma rig pa spang bar
123a4('bum): 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed du 'du shes pa dang / 'du byed spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes par 'du shes pa dang / rnam par shes pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs su 'du
123a5('bum): shes pa dang / ming dang gzugs spang bar 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug tu 'du shes pa dang / skye mched drug spang bar 'du shes pa dang / reg par 'du shes pa dang / reg pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang /
123a6('bum): tshor bar 'du shes pa dang / tshor ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sred par 'du shes pa dang / sred pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / len par 'du shes pa dang / len pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / srid par 'du shes pa
123a7('bum): dang / sring ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / skye bar 'du shes pa dang / skye ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / rga shir 'du shes pa dang / rga shi spang bar 'du shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don par 'du
123b1('bum): shes pa dang / mya ngan dang smre sngags 'don pa spang bar 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal du 'du shes pa dang / sdug bsngal kun shes par bya bar 'du shes pa dang / kun 'byung bar 'du shes pa dang /
123b2('bum): kun 'byung ba spang bar 'du shes pa dang / 'gog par 'du shes pa dang / 'gog pa mngon du bya bar 'du shes pa dang / lam du 'du shes pa dang / lam bsgom par 'du shes pa dang / rnam pa thams
123b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'du shes pa dang / bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad srung bar 'du shes pa'i bar du mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
123b4('bum): de ni med do// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos gang la'ang dngos po yod par 'du shes pa 'am/ dngos po med par
123b5('bum): 'du shes pa meng ngo // gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthun pa'i bzod pa'o// dung
123b6('bum): la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de nyid ni lam bsgom pa'o// gang la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa dang / dngos po med par 'du shes pa med pa de
123b7('bum): nyid ni 'bras bu'o// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lam ni dngos po med pa ste/ mngon par rtog pa'ang dngos po med pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar rnam grangs des kyang
124a1('bum): 'di ltar chos thams cad ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig par bya'o// gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid lags
124a2('bum): nu bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur te/ de dag mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas/
124a3('bum): chos thams cad la mnga' sbyar ba'i yul la mnga' brnyes par gyur/ de skad ces gsol pa dang / bcom ldan 'das kyis/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bkar stsal
124a4('bum): to// rab 'byor 'di la nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyod cing / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i rtse/ 'dod pas dben/ sdib to mi dge nga'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas
124a5('bum): bya dathod ba dang bsngal te/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dag ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po le nye byar bsgrubs te gnas so// rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par rjod panye bar 'i rnas ma
124a6('bum): yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa/ dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dka' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrus
124a7('bum): te gnas so// dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms la gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong zhing 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa
124b1('bum): bde ba las rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pad+mo zhes brjod pa ste/ dgar ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// bde ba'ang thangs sdug bsngal b.rang
124b2('bum): spangs shing snga ma'i yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pas yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan
124b3('bum): bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas par gyur te/ 'on kyang ngas bsam gtan de dag dang / bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag gi mtshan ma bzung ste/ bsam gtan de dag gis bsnyems
124b4('bum): bar ma gyur/ bsam gtan gyi ro myong bar mgyur/ bsam gtan du dmigs par ma gyurate/ dwe ltar na ngas bsam gtan de dag rnam pa yongs su dag pa la mnyam par bzhug go//
124b5('bum): ltar na nges bsam gtan de dag rnam par smin par byas nas shes pa rnam pa pa dang pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lnga rna ba'i shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gnos
124b6('bum): bar bya pha rol gyi sems shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa shes pa mngon du bya ba'i phyir sems gzhol bar bya/ lha'i mig gi shes pa
124b7('bum): mngon du bya ba'i sems gzhol bar bya/ 'on kyang ngas mngon par shes pa mngon du bya ba de dag la mtshan mar bzung ste/ mngon par shes pa de dag gis shes par ma 'gyur/ ro myong bar ma
125a1('bum): 'gyur/ dmigs par ma gyur ste/ mngon par shes pa lnga po de dgu nam mkha' lta bur yang dag par rjes su dran pas mnyam par bzhag ste/ de ltar ngas skad cig
125a2('bum): gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa nas 'di ni sdug bsngal lo// 'di ni sdug bsngal kun
125a3('bum): 'byung ba'o// 'di ni sdug bsngal 'bog pa'o// 'di ni sgrub bsngal 'gog par 'gyur ba'i lam mo// zhes bya bar yang dag par ji lta po bzhin du yongs su shes par gyur te de de ltar
125a4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan par 'gyur/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur/ byams pa chen po dang ldan par gyur/
125a5('bum): snying rje chen po dang ldan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang ldan par gyur nas/ sems can rnams phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur to// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
125a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis bsam gtan bzhi bskyed par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma
125a7('bum): mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mngon par shes pa drug mngon par mkhyen pa bskyeng par gyur/ ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu bskyed par gyur
125b1('bum): ji ltar dngos pos mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis mi 'jigs pa pa'i bskyed par gyur dri skar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis so so yang dag par rib pa bzhi bskyed par gyur drinar dngos po
125b2('bum): ma mchis pa'i ngo bo cad kyis byams pa chen po bskyed par gyur ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis snying rje chen po bskyed par gyur ji ltar dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis sangs rgyas
125b3('bum): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad bskyed par gyur sems can rnams kyang sems can ma mchis par ji ltar phung po gsum du lung bstan par gyur bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa / rab 'byor/
125b4('bum): gal te 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig teg mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po zhig yod de/ ngo bo nyid yod pa 'am/ bzhan gyi dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i
125b5('bum): spyad pa spod pa'i tshe 'dod pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas/ bsam gtan pa ni nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par yang
125b6('bum): mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar 'dod pa rnams dang / sdig to mi dge ba'i chos rnams la dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid med pa gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
125b7('bum): yin pas rab 'byor de'i phyir nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa rtog pa dang bcas pa dpyod pa/
126a1('bum): dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dpa' ba dang de 'asu bsam patan dung po lartse bar bsta ga tag smra ba d+hA ho// rnam pa sod pa dang / ma par
126a2('bum): dbyed pa nye bar ni nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyung bcis du gyur pas/ rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pating nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde bcan bas
126a3('bum): gtan gzis pa la ce bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// dga' bu las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms pa gnas te/ bde ba lus pas myong pa
126a4('bum): 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to//
126a5('bum): bde ba'ang spangs sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga ma nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med sdug bsngal ba'ang med pa btang snyoms dang dran pas/
126a6('bum): yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas par gyur to// rab 'byor bal te mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos pa zhig yod de/ ngo bo cid yod pa 'am/ gzhan gyi
126a7('bum): dngos po zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor ngas kyang mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rig nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par
126b1('bum): sangs rgyas par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor 'di ltar mngon par shes pa rnams la dngos po med de ngo bo nyid med pa/ gzhan gyi dngos po med pa ste/ gzhan du na dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid yin
126b2('bum): papas de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis mngon par shes pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du thugs su chung de/ bla na med pa yang
126b3('bum): dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po cho
126b4('bum): thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la/ bsam gtan bzhi dang / mngon par shes pa lngas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya na bcom ldan
126b5('bum): 'das de ci'i slang du chos thams cad dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngo bo nyid la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan/
126b6('bum): tan du bsngo ba dang / gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis slob pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan
126b7('bum): bgyi ba mchis par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ thog mar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang / byang
127a1('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag dang / sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ba'i dgra bcom pa dag dang / phyir mi 'ong ba dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang / rgyun du zhus
127a2('bum): ba dag las/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / rang sangs rgyas rnams
127a3('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / dgra bcom pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cid dang / bIr mi 'ong ba rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba rnams dngos po sa dang ngo bo
127a4('bum): nyid dang / rdzun du zhugs pa rnams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / babags pa thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang / 'du byed rnams kyi ngo bo cing chung ngun smra'i rtse mo'i cha shas kyi gnas
127a5('bum): tsam yang med de zhes bya bar thos na thang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des ci skye sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang dngos po med pa'i nga ba nyid byung chub sems
127a6('bum): smra mas dpa' sa / r+b+ha la na
127a7('bum): ming rnams pa dang ma mi meng ba'i pong yang cig kyo tshong ba mas kyang ngos pa me nge dzang song / tu du stsal ba rnam pa pang nges pa med par nga mang / 'ang lang ldan
127b1('bum): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyang rung / bal te mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma rgyas kyang rung ste/ chos thams cad ni dngos po meng pa'i ngon
127b2('bum): nyid yin gyis/ ci nas kyang bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par byas te/ sems can dngos po'i 'du shes la spyod pa thams cad dngos
127b3('bum): po med pa la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam ste/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag
127b4('bum): par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'jug ste/ mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du bya ba gang la bslabs shingasngon gyi byang chub
127b5('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pa de lta bu'i mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar rgyas
127b6('bum): bslab pa dang / mthar gyis nan tan du rtsom mo// de thog mar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin bya dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson
127b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
128a1('bum): la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // pha rol kyang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs pa brjod do// sems can
128a2('bum): gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba de dag gi'ang legs parjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de sbyin pa des skying ba chen po'i tshogs thob par 'gyur to/ skyon dang ser sna med pam
128a3('bum): sems kyis sbyin pa sbyin par bya ba dang / sbyin pa yongs su gtong bar byed do// zas 'dod pa la ni zas nom 'dod pa la ni skom bzhon pa 'dod pa la ni bzhon pa/ gos 'dod pa/
128a4('bum): la ni gos spos 'dod pa la ni spos 'phreng ba 'dod pa la ni 'greng ba byug pa 'dod pa la byug pa mal cha 'dod pa la ni mag chu/ gnas 'dor ba la ni gnas/ mar me
128a5('bum): 'dod pa la ni mar me/ nor bu dang / mu tig dang / bai zum dang / dung dang / man shel dang / b+hai ru dang / gser dang / dngul 'dod pa rnams la ni nor bu dang / mu trig
128a6('bum): dang / bai DUR+Ya dang / dung dang / man shel dang / byi ru dang / gser dang / dngul yongs su gtong ba nas/ mi'i yo byad gang ci'ang rung ba dag kyang de dag la gtong ba'i bar du ste/
128a7('bum): de sbyin pa de nyid kyi tshul khrims kyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// lha'i che ba cing rab tu thob par byed do// mi'i che ba nyid rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang tshul khrims
128b1('bum): nyi kyis ting nge 'dzin kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / rnam khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin cing kyis shes rab kyi phung po rab tu thob par byed do// desbyin pa dang /
128b2('bum): tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab de nyid kyis rnam par grol ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang/ shes
128b3('bum): rab dang / rnam par grol ba des rnam par zol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po rab tu thob par byed do// de sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dadu / shes rab dang /
128b4('bum): rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba de nyid kyis nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sem
128b5('bum): nga ba'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do//
128b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing / 'khor ba las yongs su
128b7('bum): grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med // de ci'i phyir zhe na/
129a1('bum): de ni 'di r+ya de la ngo btsod med do// rab snor bgan sang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa chen po saras dang po badrud pa nu nye bar bzung // bdag spyad rtswa
129a2('bum): khrims kyi pha rob tu phyin pa la spyod do// gzhan snang chub rims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gyur ro// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lagasu brjod do// ban num rloms kyi
129a3('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa de dag gi rang legs parjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshul khrims des lnga'i chub cing rab tu thob par byed do// mi'i che 'ing rab tu thob par byed do//
129a4('bum): de nor med pa'i sems can rnams la nor byin zhing tshul khrims la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'god do// shes rab la rab tu 'gong ngo // rnam par grol pa la rab tu 'god ngo do//
129a5('bum): rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu dbong ngo // de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang /
129a6('bum): bar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po nges nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang /
129a7('bum): rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon meng bar zhugs
129b1('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad /
129b2('bum): mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar
129b3('bum): byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyis mthar gyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do// / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni
129b4('bum): 'di ltar del ngo bo cing med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bangab kyang bzod pa'i pha rol tu sbyin
129b5('bum): ba la spyod do// gzhan yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sprul lo// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i legs brjod do// gzhan bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par dag
129b6('bum): gi'ang rigs brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod // de bzod pa'i pha rol tu sbyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul thomasu la
129b7('bum): rab tu 'thong ngo // ting nge 'dzin pa rab tu 'bong ngo // shes rab la rab tu 'gong ngo // rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'bod ngo do// rnam par grol ba'i mi shes mthong ba la rab tu 'bong ngo //
130a1('bum): de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i
130a2('bum): phung po des/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po
130a3('bum): dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyis kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
130a4('bum): yongs su dag par byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas chos kyi
130a5('bum): 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas sems can rnams theb pa gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub
130a6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pas mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid meng ngo //
130a7('bum): rab 'byor ga'an yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas che bar bzung / bdag kyang dge ba'i chos rnams pa brtson 'grus chom mo// kha'amasas
130b1('bum): brtson 'grus pa yang dag par smrab 'o// brtson 'grus kyi legs brjod do// bla' na rtson 'grus rtsom pa de dag pa'ang lebs brjod cing mthun pas dga' bar spyod do// de rtson
130b2('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs su tshim par byed do// tshul khrims la rab tu 'bod do// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu 'bod ngo do// shes rab
130b3('bum): la rab tu 'grod ngo // rnam par grol bu la rab tu 'grod ngo do// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'gong ngo // de tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang
130b4('bum): shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po des nyan thos dang rlung sangs rgyas kyi sa lus 'das nas/ tshul khrims kyi
130b5('bum): phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis/ byang chub sems
130b6('bum): dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byas sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas
130b7('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas// sems can rnams theg pa
131a1('bum): gsum la so sor 'god cing 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyis
131a2('bum): mthar gyis spyod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med do// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa'
131a3('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bdag kyang tshad med pa dang bsam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhag go
131a4('bum): gzhan yang tshang med pa dang / dasam gtan dang / gzugs med pa'i sgoms par 'jug pa la rab tu 'god do// tshad med pa dang / bas mu ga na dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
131a5('bum): 'jug pa rnam pa kyi legs brjod do// gzhan cang med pa dang / bsam gan dang / dazubs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la mnyam par gzhog pa de dag pa'i nga grogs pa rjod cing ma
131a6('bum): pas dga' bar spyod do// de tshang meng ba dang / bsam bdun dang / 'drug pa med pa'i rnams par 'jug pa dag la danas shing ka sems can rnams sbyin pas mongs su rgyas par byed pa/
131a7('bum): chul rnams pa rab tu 'bod ngo do// ting nge 'dzin parab tu bsong ngo // shes rab pa rab tu 'ayong ngo // rnam par grol ba la rab tu 'gong ngo // rnam par thol ba'i mi shes mthong ba rab tu
131b1('bum): 'god do// de rgyal khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i drung /
131b2('bum): po de tha can thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das nas tshul khrims kyi phung po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po dang / shes rab kyi phung po dang / rnam par grol ba'i phung po
131b3('bum): dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba'i phung po de nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i skyon med par zhubs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
131b4('bum): yongs su dag par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par byed do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi
131b5('bum): 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la so sor 'grod cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
131b6('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyis mthar gyis spyod pa yod pa yin te/ de thams cad kyang dmibs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid mang ngo //
131b7('bum): rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams sbyin pas yongs
132a1('bum): / tshim par byed do// tshul khrimapa la rab tu 'god do// ting nge 'dzin pa rab tu dbod do// shes rab la rab tu dbong ngo // rnam par grol pa la rab tu yod do// rnam
132a2('bum): bar grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba la rab tu 'god do// de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrims srung ngo // bzod pa sgrub bo//
132a3('bum): brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog go// shes rab sgom mo// gzhan yang sbyin pa la rab tu gzhog go// tshul khrims la rab tu gzhog go// bzod pa la rab tu gzhog
132a4('bum): gro brtson 'grus la rab tu gzhog go// ting nge 'dzin la rab tu gzhog go// shes rab la rab tu gzhog go// sbyin pa'i legs brjod do// tshul khrims kyi legs pa rjod do// bzod pa'i
132a5('bum): legs pa rjod do// brtson 'grus kyi legs pa rjod do// bsam gtan gyi legs pa rjod do// shes rab kyi legs pa rjod do// gzhan gang sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba dang / tshul khrims srung
132a6('bum): pa dang / bzod pa sgrub pa dang / brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / bsam gtan la mnyam par gzhog pa dang / shes rab sgom pa de dag gi'ang legs brjod cing mdun pas dpa' bar stod do//
132a7('bum): de sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
132b1('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / zabs mkhas pas can thos dang / rang sangs rgyas kyis las 'das nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i ston med par 'jug go// byang chub sems dpa'i
132b2('bum): skyon med par zhugs nas/ sangs rdzas kyi zhing yongs su dgu par byas/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byas nas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa cing thob par byed do// rnam pa thams
132b3('bum): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// chos kyi 'khor bskor nas/ sems can rnams theb pa gsum la so sor 'gyod cing / 'khor ba las yongs su grol bar byed do//
132b4('bum): rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyis mthar gyis spyod pa rlom ste/ thams cad dmigs su med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de la ngo bo nyid med
132b5('bum): do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya bdun cu pa// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
132b6('bum): dpa' chen po mthar gyis sbrang pu dngu/ mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa la slob ste/ de sem sa dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mabyin pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying
132b7('bum): la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byed do// de sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom mo// chos rjes su dran pa bsgom mo// dge 'dun rjes su dran pa sgom mo//
133a1('bum): tshul khrims rjes su dran pa sbom mo// gtong ba rjes su dran pa sgom mo// lha rjes su dran pa sgom mo// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
133a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'dri la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshengs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rtogs pa'i
133a3('bum): sangs rgyas bzugs su yid la mi byed/ tshor bar yid la mi byed/ 'du shes su yid la mi byed/ 'du byed du yid la mi byed/ rnam par shes par yid la mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di myur
133a4('bum): gzugs la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// tshor ba la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du shes la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo
133a5('bum): cing med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 'du byed la ngo bo nyid med de/ brang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par shes pa la ngo bo nyid med de khang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
133a6('bum): dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bu ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
133a7('bum): dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis yid la mi byed/ sku gser gyi kha dog/
133b1('bum): gis yid la mi byed/ 'od 'dom gang bas yid la mi byed/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus yid la mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis pa ngo bo nyid med de/ gangs
133b2('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// sku gser gyi kha dog la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// 'od 'jom gang ba la ngo bo nyid med de/ bang la ngo bo nying myang ba de ni dngos
133b3('bum): po med pa'o// dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran
133b4('bum): pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
133b5('bum): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas tshul khrims kyi phung por yid la mi byed/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phung por yid la mi byed/ shes rab kyi phung por yid la mi byed/ rnam par grol ba'i phung por yid la mi
133b6('bum): byed/ rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung por yid la mi byed de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar tshul khrims kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o//
133b7('bum): ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// shes rab kyi phung po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par
134a1('bum): grol ba'i phung po la ngo bo nyid myed de/ glang la ngo bo nyid med pa ni dngos po med pa'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa'i phung po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo cing
134a2('bum): med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab
134a3('bum): 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na// de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de bzhin gshegs pa'i
134a4('bum): stobs bcus yid la mi byed/ mi 'jigs pa bzhis yid la mi byed/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhis yid la mi byed/ byams pa chen pos yid la mi byed/ snying rje chen pos yid la mi byed/
134a5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyis yid la mi byed do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la ngo bo nyid med nga/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos
134a6('bum): po med pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag
134a7('bum): ni dngos po med pa'o// byams pa chen po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// snying rje chen po la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo btsang med pa de ni dngos po me
134b1('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nub te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/
134b2('bum): dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa sgom na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
134b3('bum): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar yid la bya ba mang ngo // de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la
134b4('bum): ngo bo nyid med pa de ni dngos po med pa'o// dngos po med pas ni dngos po med pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ dran pa med cing yid la bya ba med pa ni/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'o//
134b5('bum): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid lnga/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya'o//
134b6('bum): de ltar na mthar gyis spyod pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de mthar gyis spyod pa la slob cing / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug
134b7('bum): pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
135a1('bum): pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
135a2('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul/
135a3('bum): gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
135a4('bum): byi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa
135a5('bum): nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs/
135a6('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su
135a7('bum): rdzogs par byang ngo // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ thog ma dang ba ma med/
135b1('bum): pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
135b2('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
135b3('bum): gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed // dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i
135b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med
135b5('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs
135b6('bum): par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba rnam yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs
135b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par
136a1('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis// 'phags pa'i lam/
136a2('bum): yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
136a3('bum): bsam gtan rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
136a4('bum): gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i
136a5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs pa
136a6('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma meng pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin mongs
136a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med po'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ting nge 'dzin rnam/
136b1('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
136b2('bum): pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag
136b3('bum): par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ snying rje chen po
136b4('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
136b5('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
136b6('bum): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// des ni chos tham cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/ de la dngos po yod par 'du shes pa
136b7('bum): 'am dngos po med par 'du shes pa'ang med na dran pa'i las rdul tsam yang yod pa 'am/ dran pa dang bral bar gyur pa lta ci zhig smos/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa'
137a1('bum): sems dpa' chen po chos rjes su dran pa bsgom pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/
137a2('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i ying la bya bas/ chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid du rtogs par byas nas/ chos rjes su dran pa
137a3('bum): bsgom na/ dge ba'i chos yid la mi byed// mi dge pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'jig rten pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos yid la myi byed/ zang zing dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi
137a4('bum): byed zang zing med pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'phags pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ 'phags pa ma yin pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ zag pa med pa'i chos
137a5('bum): yid la mi byed/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ gzugs kyi khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed/ gzugs med pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i chos yid la mi byed/
137a6('bum): 'dus byas kyi chos yid la mi byed/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos yid la mi byed/ de ci'i phyir na na/ de ni 'di ltar chos de dag la ngo bo nyid med de/ gang la ngo bo nyid med pa de dag ni dngos po med pa'o//
137a7('bum): dngos po med pas ni dngos po meng pa dran par mi nus te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dran pa med cing yings bya ba med pa ni/ chos rjes su dran pa'o// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b1('bum): dpa' chen po chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo cing la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
137b2('bum): dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa dang / mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam yod pa yin te/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthar gyis spyad pa la slob cing
137b3('bum): mthar gyis bslab pa dang / mthar gyis 'jug pa'i lam la slob pas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i
137b4('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzobs par byed do//
137b5('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
137b6('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ nang
137b7('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis
138a1('bum): phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i
138a2('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyisadon dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med
138a3('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
138a4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzos
138a5('bum): bar byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
138a6('bum): par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid
138a7('bum): yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos po med pa
138b1('bum): stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dngos pa
138b2('bum): med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid
138b3('bum): kyi tshul gyis/ yang dag par spong ba rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med
138b4('bum): pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ dbang po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stobs rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i
138b5('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par
138b6('bum): byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ bsam gtan rnams yongs
138b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ tshad med pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
139a1('bum): par 'jug pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis rnam par thar ba brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med/
139a2('bum): bya'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dbu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po meng ba'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin yongs su
139a3('bum): rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ smon pa med pa'i
139a4('bum): ting nge 'dzin yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/
139a5('bum): ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul
139a6('bum): byis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po meng pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa
139a7('bum): ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi tshul gyis/ byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// dngos po med
