279b3('bum): dag par gzengs bstod do// yang dag par dga' bar byed do// 'dul lo// gnog go// rab tu 'god do// de zag pa med pa'i chos gzugs med pa bstan du med pa/ thogs pa

287a3('bum): byas nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul dang / yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / rjes su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dag gis sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can

287a5('bum): gyis chos ston pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang btang snyoms chen po mchos stom
287a6('bum): des sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang /
287a7('bum): de dag sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par langs nas lha dang ming ga dang rgal ba ma'am par skyes shing rim gyis theg pa gsum gyis sdug bsngal mthar 'byin pa mthong /
287b1('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dbang

287b3('bum): dang yongs su bstan pa'i cho 'phrul dang rjes su bstan po'i cho 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul gsum po de dgags sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag la chos sbyin cing

287b5('bum): dang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / dga' ba chen po dang / btang snyoms chen pos chos ston te/ des sem
287b6('bum): can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing / sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang

288a6('bum): sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la sems mos par byas shing sems can dmyal ba chen po de dag nas rnam par ldang

292a1('bum): bya/ thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi/ thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus par shin tu dad pas bsten bkur byed cing / byang chub sems dpa'

294a1('bum): dgyes par 'gyur ba dang thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing byang /

294a3('bum): par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bachang zhing nam du'ang chung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na 'og gi phyogs kyi
294a4('bum): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub

294a6('bum): sru byon pa dang ma gus pas ma yin gyi gus par shin tu dad pas bsnyen bkur byed cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag
294a7('bum): gis chos gang bstan pa de'ang 'dzin cing bzung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing nam du'ang chung mi gzon to//
294b1('bum): rab 'byor ngas 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
294b2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed pa rnams mthong ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dri dag la
294b3('bum): dgyes par mi 'gyur bar ma yin gyi/ dgyes par 'gyur ba dang / thugs su mi byon pas ma yin gyi thugs su byon pa dang / ma gus pas ma yin gyi gres par shin tu dang
294b4('bum): pas bsnyen bkur byed cing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos gang bstan pa de'ang 'dzin cing bzung nas/ bla na med pa
294b5('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du 'chang zhing na ma du'ang chung mi gzon to// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nyid nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
294b6('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyis khams gad+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byol song gi
294b7('bum): gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyi don du bdag yongs su gtong ba byed cing / de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag yan lag dang nying lag bcad cing gtubs te/ phyogs
295a1('bum): bcur rnam par mthor ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas su gtogs pa'i sems can de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis sha zos nas

300a6('bum): dag tu skyes nas kyang / sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes par byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag le bsnyen bkur byed pa dang / de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das na

300b2('bum): pa'i byang chub tu sems skyed cing / de bzhin nyid du nan tan byed pa de dag ni de ltar phan pa mang po byed pa'o// / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po
300b3('bum): nyis brgya don brgyad pa// / rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
300b4('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i
300b5('bum): phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can mi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de gnas rnam
300b6('bum): par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang ma'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
300b7('bum): ba'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis/
301a1('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can li
301a2('bum): dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi
301a3('bum): yul ba de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
301a4('bum): rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du
301a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'brel bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub
301a6('bum): phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug
301a7('bum): bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jal zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
301b1('bum): de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig
301b2('bum): rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las bdas pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam lang 'bral bar
301b3('bum): mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang
301b4('bum): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing sar sna spang ba'i phyir
301b5('bum): chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas
301b6('bum): rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las
301b7('bum): 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs
302a1('bum): rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed drag na/ byang chub sems dpa'
302a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'ji ba zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston
302a3('bum): ba dang / de dag na sems can mi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par
302a4('bum): ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang ga nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye rtse/ drang po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das
302a5('bum): pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyu
302a6('bum): hU~Ms 'jig rten la rnam par gzigasan/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i brang gi khyim snyeng dgang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen thomamaldacan midu
302a7('bum): khrisras 'jams kyi me ga 'tsha ma ya ngacan/ sdug bsngal ji srid kyi pa yong ba dag thams ca rab tu ma thong sams papa'i byor tshel stor pa dang / dadapa na sems can ming bgyis
302b1('bum): pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de gnas rnam par
302b2('bum): la ngas nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas
302b3('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtsham
302b4('bum): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams ga d+hA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig
302b5('bum): yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i
302b6('bum): sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang
302b7('bum): mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnam dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur
303a1('bum): bdag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
303a2('bum): klung gi bye ma sbe dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi ngogs kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab
303a3('bum): tu 'jil zhing ser sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing
303a4('bum): yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/

303a6('bum): 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
303a7('bum): chen po sems can yi dgas kyi grol ba rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug bsngal ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu 'jil zhing sar sna spang ba'i phyir chos ston pa dang / de dag
303b1('bum): na sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas dang gnas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas

303b3('bum): 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dag mthong ngo // rab 'byor ngas 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/
303b4('bum): steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can yi dgas kyi yul pa rnams kyi yi dgas kyi yul de dag na/ sdug

303b6('bum): po de dag la byams pa'i sems skyed cing / yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par ldang ba dang / de dag yi dgas kyi skye gnas de dag nas rnam par langs nas/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de nyid kyis
303b7('bum): lha'i 'jig rten dang mi'i 'jig rten du skye ste/ phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang nam

304a6('bum): byed thams cad ni mi rtag pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni sdug bsngal ba 'du byed thams cad ni bdag med pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni mi brtan pa/ 'du byed thams cad ni med brtan du mi
304a7('bum): rung ba 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'thur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byang rnams la lhas ni ga jebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor ngas ling 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sman
304b1('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lde phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal chen 'di'i ris kyi lnga

308b1('bum): ba mthong ste/ rab 'byor dal lha'i bulang 'dod pa'i yon tam ldas gas cher myos par dag la gzhal med khang de dag 'bar bar snang bar byas shing / de dag skyo bar gyur bar shes nas 'di rung du
