308b3('bum): brtan du mi rung ba 'du byed thams cad ni rnam par 'gyur ba'i chos can yin na/ 'du byed rnams la lta su zhig yid khebs par gnas shes chos ston to// rab 'byor
308b4('bum): ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
308b5('bum): dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha
308b6('bum): stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems
308b7('bum): can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan
309a1('bum): gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems
309a2('bum): can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dang chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i
309a3('bum): rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor
309a4('bum): de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmang du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spun gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/
309a5('bum): nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lte ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs
309a6('bum): bo dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lte bskyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gso ba sha b+hag la ci zhig lnga bskyed ces lnga ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong \u0f7f/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub
309a7('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams
309b1('bum): mang du byung ba'i tsham mo// rab 'byor dum yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig can gyi khams pang+gA'i klung gi bye ba snyed da na
309b2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa dag la/ kye thogs pa dag chos thams cad stong pa la ni zhog ba byed/ tsho tham
309b3('bum): cad gsog dang gsob sha sngag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la
309b4('bum): gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di
309b5('bum): nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma skyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
309b6('bum): po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gso ba sha stag la ci zhig lta/
309b7('bum): bskyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos
310a1('bum): ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs
310a2('bum): rgyas kyi spun gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
310a3('bum): sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gso sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed/
310a4('bum): ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos
310a5('bum): to rab 'byor do na ngo mtshar me ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmang du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig
310a6('bum): la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs
310a7('bum): pa'i lta ba la mngon par len pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lnga pa'i rnam
310b1('bum): pa dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor da ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor/
310b2('bum): de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor dang yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par bzug
310b3('bum): na nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon
310b4('bum): par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad sdong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lhu ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar
310b5('bum): byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che sna
310b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig
310b7('bum): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs po'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams
311a1('bum): cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba skyed/ chos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar/
311a2('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar ma ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dngapa
311a3('bum): chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye
311a4('bum): ma sbed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gang tshangs pa'i lta ba la mngon par zhen pa de dag la/ kye grogs po dag chos thams cad stong pa la ci zhig lta ba
311a5('bum): skyedachos thams cad gsog dang gsob sha stag la ci zhig lta ba skyed ces lta ba'i rnam pa de dag dang bral bar byed pa mthong ste/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
311a6('bum): rnams snying rje chen po la gnas shing / sems can rnams la chos ston to// rab 'byor de ni ngo mtshar che ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rmad du byung ba'i chos so//
311a7('bum): rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
311b1('bum): dpa' chen po dag / mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor dpa yang
311b2('bum): 'di nas sangs rgyag kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ sgo phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma sdang dgon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' nan po dag
311b3('bum): mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas lang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi
311b4('bum): spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag no/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ mi rnams bsdu ba'i
311b5('bum): dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
311b6('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
311b7('bum): sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyi 'jig rten la rnam par
312a1('bum): gzigs na/ byang shar gyi phyogs tshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed dkan/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ minam
312a2('bum): bsdu 'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhen/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi rgyun
312a3('bum): kyis 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ shAr lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kad+hA'i klung gi byes skyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po da/ mi rnam
312a4('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig sman pa dang / don spya ba dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis
312a5('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed ngag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ mi rnams
312a6('bum): bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi sngun
312a7('bum): kyis 'jig cem pa rnam par gzigs na nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i grong gi bye ma snyed dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ mi rnams
312b1('bum): bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhis sdung pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe nA/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don spyang ba dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gying/
312b2('bum): 'jig rten la rnam par gzigs na/ 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dkon/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'i chen po dag/ mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po
312b3('bum): bzhis sdud pa mthong ste/ bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / den spyad pa dang / don mthun pa'o// rab 'byor ngas yang 'di nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan gyis 'jig rten la rnam
312b4('bum): par gzigs na/ steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag no/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag/ mi rnams bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sdud pa mthong
312b5('bum): sde bzhi gang zhe na/ sbyin pa dang / tshig snyan pa dang / don sdud pa dang / don mthun pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pabam po nyis
312b6('bum): brgya don dgu pa// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems
312b7('bum): dpa' chen po sbyin pa gnyis kyis sems can rnams sdud de/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
313a1('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po zang zing gi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin nen/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i cho
313a2('bum): gser ram/ dngul lam/ nor bu 'am/ mu tig gas/ bain+dar+tha 'am/ dung ngam/ man shel lam/ byin 'am/ sa le sbram mam/ zas sam/ skom mam/ gdugs sam/ gos
313a3('bum): sngam spos sama'aphreng ba 'am byug pa'am/ mal cha'am/ stan nam 'tshe ba 'am/ bud med dam/ skyes pa'am/ rta'am/ glang po 'am/ bdag po yongs su gtong na/
313a4('bum): 'di skad du kye sems can dag tshur shog/ bdag nyid kyi dang 'dra bar bslang mi dgos par khyer cig/ long la deng zhig ces brjod de/ sbyin pa des sbyin pa de byin nas/ sangs rgyas la sgrubs su bco
313a5('bum): chos la skyabs su gtong ngo // dge 'dun la skyabs su gtong ngo // la la ni bslab pa'i gnas lnga 'dzin du 'dzud do// la la ni yan log brgyad dang ldan pa'i gso sbyin la nye bar gnas
313a6('bum): pa la nye bar gnas par byed do// la la ni dge bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan dang po la 'god do// la la ni bsam gtan gnyis pa la 'god do// la la ni bsam
313a7('bum): gtan gsum pa la 'god do// la la ni 'asam gtan bzhi pa la 'gong ngo // la la ni byams pa la 'god do// la la ni snying rjel 'god do// la la ni dga' ba la 'dod do// la la ni btang snyoms
313b1('bum): la 'god do// la la ni namam pa' mtha' las skye mched la 'dod do// lalani nam shes mtha' las skye mtshad la 'tho sa / la la ni drung ba mad pa'i skyem chad la 'asho do// lal mi dun
313b2('bum): med 'du shes med min ste mched la 'god do// la la ni sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa la yang dag par sprul le/ la la ni chos rjes su dran pa la yang dag par sprul lo// la la ni na
313b3('bum): 'dun rjes su dran pa laM yang dag par sprul la// lA la ni tshulnga khrims rjes su ngan pal+la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni gtong ba rjes su dran pa la yang dgra pa'i skal lo// la la ni
313b4('bum): rjes su dran pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la nI lus la mi gtsang ba la sogs pa'i bdu shes so sor brtag pa la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam par dag pa la yang dag
313b5('bum): par skul lo// la la ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni yang dag par spong ba bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la yang
313b6('bum): dag par skul lo// la la ni dbang po lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stobs lnga la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la yang dag par sprul lo// la
313b7('bum): ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pal yang dag par skul lo// la la ni stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rnam
314a1('bum): par thar pa brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// lal ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgul yang dag par skul lo// la la ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
314a2('bum): bcu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni byams pa chen po la yang dag
314a3('bum): par skul lo// la la ni snying rje chen po la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis
314a4('bum): yongs su grub par bya ba la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni
314a5('bum): lhan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bral yang dag par skul lo// la la ni dgra bcom pa nyid la yang dag por sprul lo// la la
314a6('bum): ni rang byang chub la yang dag par skul lo// la la ni lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yang dag par sprul lo// la laM ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par rnal lo// rab 'byor
314a7('bum): de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la zang zing gi sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing / thengs mkhas pas bla
314b1('bum): na med pa'i dade ba dang ldan par 'god do// rab 'byor du ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ngo mtshar dang rmad nga byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub
314b2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos kyi sbyin pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhen/ rab 'byor gnyis po 'di dag ni chos kyi sbyin patha
314b3('bum): 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'o// rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gang zhe na/ 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams brjod pa dang / bsha pa dang /
314b4('bum): nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang / gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang / mngon
314b5('bum): par shes pa lnga dang / gzhan yang 'jig rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye bo dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o// rab 'byor byang chub
314b6('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges 'jig rten gyi chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas/ rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos ma nor bar blangs pa de las skyed de/ de las bskyed nas/ thabs
314b7('bum): mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang / 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do// de la 'phags pa'i chos rnams ni gang / 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni
315a1('bum): gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos shes bya ba ni/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang /
315a2('bum): stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa rnams so//
315a3('bum): 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub
315a4('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o//
315a5('bum): dgra bcom pa nyid shes pa'o// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// brtson 'grus kyi pha
315a6('bum): rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// bsamo gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o// nang stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi stong pa nyid shes pa'o// phyi nang stong pa/
315a7('bum): nyid shes pa'o// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chen po stong pa nyid shes pa'o// don dam pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid shes pa'o//
315b1('bum): mtha' las 'angs bstong pa nyid shes pa'o// thog sa dang tham med pa rtsod pa nyid shes pa'o// dor bamang pasnong ci shes pago / rang bzhin stong pa nyid shes pa'o// chos thams cad byang ba
315b2('bum): pa'o// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po meng pa stong pa nyid shes pa'o// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dngos po mang po'i ngo tshang /
315b3('bum): stong pa nyid shes pa'o// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi shes pa'o// yang dag par spong ba bzhi shes pa'o// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi shes pa'o// dbang po lta shes pa'o// stobs ldang shes pa'o//
315b4('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa shes pa'o// 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi shes pa'o// bsam gtan bzhi shes pa'o// tshad med pa bzhi shes
315b5('bum): pa'o// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad shes pa'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu shes pa'o// rnam par thar pa'i sgo snang pa
315b6('bum): nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa shes pa'o// mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o// ting nge 'dzin rnams shes pa'o// gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
315b7('bum): bcu shes pa'o// mi 'jigs pa bzhi shes pa'o// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi shes pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o// byams pa chen po shes pa'o// snying rje chen po shes pa'o//
316a1('bum): dga' ba chen po shes pa'o// btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o// gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag/
316a2('bum): pa med pa'i chos rnams dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma gtogs par de dag/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
316a3('bum): chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so// byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad
316a4('bum): spong ba ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to//
316a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin/
316a6('bum): no/ de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems
316a7('bum): dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ci zhig mchis/ bcom ldan
316b1('bum): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do// gsol pa/ bye brag ji la bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa/
316b2('bum): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad la mun pa med pa 'thob pa la
316b3('bum): byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do// rab 'byor de ni byang chub se
316b4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo // rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
316b5('bum): dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas/ rnam pa thams cad margya
316b6('bum): pa nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no// / rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang thun mong
316b7('bum): ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag
317a1('bum): bdun dang / 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa/
317a2('bum): dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / byams pa chen po dang /
317a3('bum): snying rje chen po dang / mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang / gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ 'di ni 'jig rten las
317a4('bum): dngas pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de la dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang / phyi'i lus dang / phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su
317a5('bum): lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta/
317a6('bum): zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// lus la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten
317a7('bum): du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi tshor ba dang / phyi'i tsher ba dang / phyi nang gi tshor ba la tshor ba'i rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig
317b1('bum): rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod pa
317b2('bum): tshor ba la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// tshor ba la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi sems dang / phyi'i sems
317b3('bum): dang / phyi nang gi sems la sems kyi rjes su lta zhing / brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / ying mi bde ba rnam par bsal
317b4('bum): zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// sems la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam
317b5('bum): par spyod do/ sems la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do// nang gi chos dang / phye'i chos dang / phyi nang gi chos la chos kyi rjes sulta zhing / brtson
317b6('bum): 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa/ dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang / yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
317b7('bum): spyod ngo do// chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do// chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing / 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar
318a1('bum): len pa med do// rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams mi skyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed pa dang / skyes pa rnams spang ba'i
318a2('bum): phyir rtsol ba dang / dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa skyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang / skyes pa rnams 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang / bsgom pa yongs su rdzogs
318a3('bum): par bya ba'i phyir mos paskyed pa'o// rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / sems kyi ting nge 'dzin spong
318a4('bum): ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang / dpyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdza phru
318a5('bum): gyi rkang pa'o// dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang / brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang / dran pa'i dbang po dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang / shes rab kyi dbang po ste/ de dag ni dbang po lda nas/
318a6('bum): bya'o// stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang / brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang / dran pa'i stobs dang / ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang / shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes
318a7('bum): bya'o// rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / chos rnam par 'a byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / brtson 'grus yang dag
318b1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag dang / dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / shin tu byung ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang / btang snyoms yang
318b2('bum): ngag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o// rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgya dang gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtog pa
318b3('bum): dang ro yang dag pa'i ngag dang / yang dag pa'i las kyi mtha' dang / yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang / yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang / yang dag pa'i dran pa dang / yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags
318b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa zhes bya'o// de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to// stong pa nyid
318b5('bum): kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang / dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i
318b6('bum): rnam pa dang / mtshan ma meng pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang / sdug
318b7('bum): bsngal gyi rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o// rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gyis gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa
319a1('bum): dang po'o// nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pas/ phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o// bzang bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa
319a2('bum): gsum pa'o// nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o// rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par
319a3('bum): thar pa lnga pa'o// cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o// 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam
319a4('bum): par thar pa bdun pa'o// 'du shes dang tsher rab 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o// mthar gyis gnas pa'i
319a5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dpon/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyis dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba
319a6('bum): dang bde ba can bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam par rtog pa dang / rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas/ rtog pa med
319a7('bum): par dpyod pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas/ dran pa dang ldan zhing
319b1('bum): shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la/ 'phags pa rnams kyis de la dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par spyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba ched /
319b2('bum): pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de bde ba'ang spangs// sdug bsngal ba'ang spangs shing / yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas/ bde ba'ang med/ sdug
319b3('bum): bsngal ba'ang med pa/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag
319b4('bum): par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing / sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas// nam mkha' mtha' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
319b5('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mtha' yas so zhes rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched la nye bar
319b6('bum): bsgrubs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so//
319b7('bum): de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'odas te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrungs te gnas so// de rnam pa thams cad du 'dra
320a1('bum): shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs shing gnas te/ 'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms/
320a2('bum): par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o// de la mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ mtha' dag sa dang / mtha' dag chu dang / mtha' dag me dang / mtha' dag rlung dang / mtha' dag sngon po dang / mtha'
320a3('bum): dwag ser po dang / mtha' dag dmar po dang / mtha' dag dkar po dang / mtha' dag rnam par shes pa dang / mtha' dag nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni mtha' dag gi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o// de la
320a4('bum): zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil
320a5('bum): gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o// nang gzugs su 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha
320a6('bum): dog sdug pa dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o//
320a7('bum): nang gzugs med par 'dra shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rnga mo dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang / gzugs de dgazil gyis mnan teng shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong nin
320b1('bum): de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang / kha dog sdug gu dang / kha dog mi sdug pa mthong dang /
320b2('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bzhi pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi
320b3('bum): gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po/ 'di lnga ste/ dper na me tog o ma ka lta bu 'am/ yul wA rAN+Da sIr byas pa'i gos ltar sngo ba/ kha dog sngob/ sngo bar snang
320b4('bum): ba mdog sngo bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyi sa mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o// nang gzugs
320b5('bum): med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na shing kar shi ka ra'i me tog lta bu'am/ yul wA rA Na sir byas pa'i
320b6('bum): gos lhar ser ba/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil
320b7('bum): gyis gnon pa'i skye mched drug pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing / phyi rol gyi gzugs dmar po/ kha dog dmar // dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po/ 'di lta ste
321a1('bum): dper na ban du dzi ba kra'i me tog lta bu 'am/ yul wA rA NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar ba/ dmar bar snang ba/ mdog dmar bar mthong yang
321a2('bum): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar badra shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o// nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing
321a3('bum): phyi rol gyi gzugs dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar po/ 'di lta ste/ dper na skar ma pa wa sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul wA rA NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dka
321a4('bum): pa/ kha dog dkar ba/ dkar bar snang ba// mdog dkar bar mthong yang / gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing / de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye
321a5('bum): mched brgyad pa'o// de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnam par spyod pa/ sems can pha rol dang / gang zag pa
321a6('bum): rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o// smon lam gyi shes pa gang nyon/ bsam gtan la gnas te/ 'di shes pa
321a7('bum): bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par gyur pa de la yid kyi smon pa byed de/ de ting nge 'dzin de las langs nas/
321b1('bum): de'i smon lam yongs su grub par gyur cing / shes bya de'ang shes pa de ni smon lam gyi shes pa zhes bya'o// nga la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i
321b2('bum): mig gi mngon par shes pa dang / lha'i rna ba'i mngon par shes pa dang / pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang / zag pa
321b3('bum): zad pa shes pa'i mngon par shes pa ste/ drug po de dag go// de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus yongs su dag pa dang / dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang / sems yongs su dag pa dang /
321b4('bum): ye shes yongs su dag pa ste/ bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshol dbang ba dang / sems la dbang ba dang / yo byad la dbang ba dang / las la dbang ba dang / skye ba la dbang ba dang /
321b5('bum): mos pa la dbang ba dang / smon lam la dbang ba dang / rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang / ye shes la dbang ba dang / chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
321b6('bum): bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la'ang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// gnas ma yin pa la'ang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba
321b7('bum): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i las dang / las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang / chu'i rnam par yang dag pa
322a1('bum): ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// khams sna tshogs can dang / khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag
322a2('bum): gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs pa dang / mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang / tham shes par bya ba yang dag pa ji
322a3('bum): lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// dbang po dang / stobs dang / byang chub kyi yan lag dang / bsam gtan dang / rnam
322a4('bum): par thar pa dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / snyoms par 'jug pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa dang / rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to// rnam pa du mar sngon
322a5('bum): gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang / tshe rabs stong dang / tshe rabs brgya phrag stong dang / tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
322a6('bum): gi bar du'ang rjes su dgongs so// bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang / bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang / bskal pa stong phrag du ma dang / bskal pa brgya stong
322a7('bum): du ma dang / bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go// ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar
322b1('bum): gyur to// rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to// zas ni 'di za za'o// yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so// tshe'i mtha' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas shi 'phos nas chege mo zhig tu/
322b2('bum): skyes so zhes bya ba nas/ de nas shi 'phos nas kyang 'dir skyes so zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa mal dang bcas/ gtan tshigs dang bcas par rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su
322b3('bum): dgongs so// lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba dag kyang gzigs so// kha dog sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa dang / bzang ba dang / ngan pa dang /
322b4('bum): bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang / ngan song na 'khong pa dang / las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong po'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag
322b5('bum): gis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par
322b6('bum): ltung ba sems can dmyal bar skye'o// sems can 'di dag ni lus kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ ngag gis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyis legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa
322b7('bum): 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten lnga'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to// zag pa rnams
323a1('bum): zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang / shes rab rnam par rgol ba zag pa med pa yang dag par ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen te/ bcu po de dag ni de bzhin gshegs
323a2('bum): pa'i stobs so// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na/ de la chos 'di rnams mngon par sangs
323a3('bum): ma rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes
323a4('bum): bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes sra ma mthong bas/ bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog
323a5('bum): rlabs po che'i gnas sra dam bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgrub sgrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ gzhan sus
323a6('bum): kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// bdag zag pa zad do zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur to zhes
323a7('bum): bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdung ngam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu
323b1('bum): yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/
323b2('bum): khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' lo// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
323b3('bum): pa 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la bsten na
323b4('bum): bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur ro zhes dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sa'ang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol
323b5('bum): bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa
323b6('bum): thob par rnam par spyod de// khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' bo// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgrub skrag go// tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/
323b7('bum): bdud ngam/ tshangs po ram/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o// gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba rtogs par 'gyur ba de byed
324a1('bum): pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la/ nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar mi 'byung ngo zhes dge slong ngam/ bram
324a2('bum): ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang yang dag pararo rjes su mi mthong
324a3('bum): ste rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang / bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang / mi 'jigs pa thob par rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam
324a4('bum): bca' 'o// 'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na/ dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lnga 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sras kyang rung ste/
324a5('bum): chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa/ bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ste/ bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na/
324a6('bum): 'di lta ste/ don so so yang dag par rig pa dang / chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang / nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang / spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang zhe na/
324a7('bum): don la dmigs pa dang / chos la dmigs pa dang / nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang / slob sa pa la dmigs pa'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhen/
324b1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab
324b2('bum): par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o// de bzhin gshegs pa ni gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa
324b3('bum): la gsung gi spyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas// la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o//
324b4('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su mdag pa mi mnga' bas/ la las shes su 'ong zhes gang yang
324b5('bum): bcab par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
324b6('bum): chos ston pa'i tshe/ 'di la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mthun pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na'ang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi
324b7('bum): 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yang yang por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror mi nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems
325a1('bum): bar gzhog pa med pa dang / chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed na'ang / des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur// thugs
325a2('bum): mi ches par mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o// la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog la/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan
325a3('bum): tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de ri mthor mi nyan cing / bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du mi byed kyang / des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa
325a4('bum): 'am thugs khro ba gnyis su mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa dang ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o// de la de bzhin
325a5('bum): gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las
325a6('bum): mi 'da' ba ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon
325a7('bum): mongs pa spangs kyang de dag la lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu'ang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs pa zhes bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs
325b1('bum): pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas/ 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir/ dus thams cad du 'dzi
325b2('bum): rten la zhin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad ces bya ste/ dngos sun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mtha' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba
325b3('bum): la gzigs pa rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o// rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'phrul
325b4('bum): pa mi mnga'o// ca co mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// 'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o// thugs mnyam par ma bzhag pa mi mnga' 'o// ma brtag pa'i btang snyoms mi med
325b5('bum): 'o/ mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// dgongs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o//
325b6('bum): shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mang 'a'o// rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o// sku'i 'phrin las thams
325b7('bum): cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // gsung gi 'phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ yeng shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // thugs kyi 'dzin las thams
326a1('bum): cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ngo // 'das pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go// ma 'ongs pa'i dus lam
326a2('bum): chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug go/ da ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so// rab
326a3('bum): 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa/ dran pas dbang sgyur ba/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i mtshan nyid med pa'i mtshan nyid
326a4('bum): ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa dang / zhabs shin
326a5('bum): tu gnas pa dang / phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba dang / phyag dang zha bas gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mtho ba dang / sor mo ring ba dang / rting pa yangs pa dang / skra che zhing drang ba dang /
326a6('bum): zhabs legs par mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu rkyen du 'khyil ba dang / ri dgas e nu ya'i byin bu lta bu dang / phyag bar drang por skyebs pa dang / gsang ba'i sranas sbubs su nub pa dang / gser gyi
326a7('bum): kha dog dang / mdog shin tu 'jam pa dang / spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa dang / seng ge'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang / zas po//
326b1('bum): shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro 'i mchog dang // gdun mod ltar chu dang gab pa dang / dbu sbyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang / ljags shin tu yangs pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang / seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang / choms shin tu
326b2('bum): dkar ba dang / tshems shin tu mnyam pa dang / tshems thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang / spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs
326b3('bum): pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stobs dang ldan pa du khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa/ rnam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa/ 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am/ bsil gzugs brkos pa dang
326b4('bum): 'dra ba mnga' bas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa'o// zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'jog cing / zhabs zhum pa med pas/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa'o// ngang pa'i rgyal
326b5('bum): po ltar phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bar 'brel bas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bar 'brel ba'o// shing bal gyi be'u ltar shin tu 'jam zhing gzhon pas/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o//
326b6('bum): phyag dang / zhabs dang / mgur gyi lhun shin tu mtho bas/ bdun shin tu mtho ba'o// phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas/ sor mo ring ba'o// rting po ring bas/ rting pa langs pa'o// sku lag pa
326b7('bum): bdun du 'phags la drang bas/ ske che zhing drang ba'o// spus mo'i lhang dang long bu mdzes par nub pas/ zhabs legs par mtho ba'o// spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyil bas
327a1('bum): yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o// ridags e n+ya la'i byin pa dang / smyig ma dang / ldum bu dar ba ltar drang zhing mnyams la rim gyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum
327a2('bum): pas/ ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu'o// baR+Sha drang por bzhag ste/ ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis pus mo'i lha nga la reg pas/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa'o// glang po dang
327a3('bum): rta cang shes lhar gsang ba'i gnas shin tu mdzes par sbubs su nub pas/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o// shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas/ gser gyi kha dog
327a4('bum): go/ gser dang dngul shin tu sbyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing snyems pa'i mdog tu 'dug la/ skul rdul mi 'go bas mdog shin tu 'jam pa'o// shin tu rnam par phye ba'i spu re rer skyes shing
327a5('bum): gnyis su med pas/ s+phu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba'o// me tog kun dang / zla ba dang / 'o ma dang / ba mo'i mdog lhar 'dug la/ nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags
327a6('bum): par 'od gsal ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas/ zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa'o// ro stod che bas/ seng ge'i re sdod do// mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel cing lha
327a7('bum): zlum pas/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o// gser gyi gtan pa shin tu phyi ba pa ltar phrag so legs par grub pas/ phrags shin tu rgyas pa'o// rlung dang / mkhris pa dang /
327b1('bum): bad kan gyis ma nyams shing / rnam par shes pa 'dra ba med pas ro bro ba'i mchog go// sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas/ shing n+ya grong ltar na zheng gab pa'o// spyi gtsub zlus ning lags
327b2('bum): ya/ g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o// me tog ut+pal dmar po'i 'dab ma'i kha dog
327b3('bum): ltar 'dug cing shin tu yangs pas/ ljags shin tu langs shing srab pa'o// tshangs pa dang / bya ka la bid ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs so// 'gram pa me long gi dkyil
327b4('bum): 'khor ltar legs par grub cing / mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o// me tog kun dang / dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mngab bas/
327b5('bum): tshems shin tu dkar ba'o// tshems la mtho dman med pas/ choms mnyam pa'o// tshams la mtshams mdod pas/ tshems thags bzang ba'o// bla 'og tu gyi gu meng pas/ tshems mnyam
327b6('bum): zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba'o// dkar gnag gi cha ma 'dres la/ shin tu rnam par dag cing / mdog dmar pos ma g.yogs pas/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o// rdzi ma bla 'og shin tu
327b7('bum): legs par gnas lam 'dzings pas/ ba'i rdzi ma lta bu'o// de la bla ma'i bsu bskyal dang / chos mnyan pa la sdod pa dang / gtsug lag khang dang / mchod rten rjes su
328a1('bum): bsgrubs pa la sogs pa la phu dud du byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa skyeb ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so// yi dam la brtan
328a2('bum): pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga ltas so// sbyin pa dang / ngag snyan pa dang / don spyod pa dang / don mthun pa'i bsgrub rnam bzhi goms par byas
328a3('bum): pas/ phyag dang zha bas dra bar 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'dra ba'i snga ltas so// bza' ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung ba zhim zhing nyams su badri ba byin pas phyag dang
328a4('bum): zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang / bdun shin tu mdzu ba ste/ de gnyis ni bzang ba dang / bca' ba dang / btung bzhi ma zhing nyams su bde ba 'thob pa'i snga ltas so// bcings pa
328a5('bum): bkrol ba dang / srog gi rim gro byas pa dang / srog gcod pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang / rting ba yangs pa dang / sku che zhing drang ba skye/ de ni sku tshe ring ba'i snga ltas so// da
328a6('bum): ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang / bzung ba mngon par spel cing / 'grib par ma byas pas/ zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang / yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil pa ste/ de ni mi nyams pa'i chos
328a7('bum): dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so// rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing / gzhan la byin pa dang / bdag gis blangs pas/ ri dgas e n+ya ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du 'dzin pa'i snga
328b1('bum): lhas so// bdog cing yod pa'i nor la bskang na mi 'gong bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas/ phyag bar drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad la mngang ba dang / dul ba'i snga ltas so// 'phrog
328b2('bum): pa dang / mdza' bshes dang / gnyen pa ma bya ba dang / bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul ba dang / gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas/ gsang
328b3('bum): ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so// stan dang / gos dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po byin pas/ gser gyi kha dog dang / mdog
328b4('bum): shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dung / na bza' dang / khang pa dang / gzhal med khang dang / gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so// 'du 'dzi spangs pa dang / mkhan po dang /
328b5('bum): slob dpon dang / pha ma dang / phu nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gro byas pa dang / btsun par byas pa dang / bcol ba rnal ma gzan pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs
328b6('bum): su 'khyil ba dang / zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni mnyam pa med pa'i sgra ltas so// mi snyan par mi zer zhing mi smod la/ snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad par 'thun par 'dzin pas/
328b7('bum): seng no'i ro stod lta bu dang / phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa med pa'i snga ltas so// na ba rnams la rtsi dang / rim gro dang / sman dang / nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa
329a1('bum): dang / rim gro byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang / ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so// skyed mos tshal dang / 'khor dang btung ba dang / rdzing bu
329a2('bum): dang / brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang / kha zas dang / 'phreng ba'i gan pa dang / stegs dang / gtsug lag khang byang la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing / bdag gis
329a3('bum): gzhan byin pas/ shing n+ya gro daltar chu zheng gab pa dang / dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni ba 'i chen po mnga' da'i snga ltas so// yun ring por tshig snyan cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su
329a4('bum): bde bar smras pas/ ljags shin tu yangs shing srad pa dang / tshangs pa'i dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so// gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa
329a5('bum): zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par 'gyur ba dang / mnyanan dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang / zab cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang / btang mi bri zhing rnar snyan pa dang / ma
329a6('bum): 'khrugs shing gasngal ba'o// yun ring po nas tshig bkyil basbyangs shing / dus su sma smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis mnyan pa'i snga ltas so// rim gror bya ba dang / brnyas
329a7('bum): pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas/ choms shin tung kar ba dang / mtshama'i ste// de ni 'khor ldanas bsags pa'i snga lums// lun ring po nas bden ning phram med pa'i tshig snga ma
329b1('bum): bas/ choms thags bzang ba dang / tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so// pang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsams pa mang la/ ma chags shing
329b2('bum): mi sdang ba dang / rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lha bas/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes pa dang / ba'i rdzi ma lta bu ste/ de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so// rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
329b3('bum): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad
329b4('bum): las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen shes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa dang bde ba'i thugs mnga' ba ste
329b5('bum): sen mo'i mdog sdum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon por byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul la kha na ma
329b6('bum): ba mi mnga' bste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i
329b7('bum): rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ ser mo rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang / gsung dang / sku'i 'phrin las dang / 'tshe ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi
330a1('bum): mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grel pa ste/ rtsa la mdud pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
330a2('bum): shin tu dben pa'i chos mnga' ba ste/ long bu mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad la sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mi mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs/
330a3('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mo'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i glang po ste/ glang po'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs
330a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang pa'i stabs su bzhed pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyum chog
330a5('bum): gi stabs sra bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun pa'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni blta na mdzes
330a6('bum): pa ste/ mdzes par bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam
330a7('bum): par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos rnams shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs
330b1('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang / gsung dang / thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku
330b2('bum): shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis thugs 'jam pa dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin
330b3('bum): gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin tu rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/
330b4('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang ba ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs
330b5('bum): mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mchog tu 'jam pa'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin tu gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag
330b6('bum): tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ skra zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
330b7('bum): ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag dang nying lag
331a1('bum): legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nying lag sba bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ snang ba
331a2('bum): rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste byal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor
331a3('bum): ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byung ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ning rgyal gyi dedu bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin sang
331a4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par klog pa ste/ byal phya ma mer 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin tu thugs su chung pa ste/
331a5('bum): bzab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun par 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba skye/ lta ba ga las phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
331a6('bum): slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun med pa bste/ kun nas mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin tu gtsung ma dang ldan pa ste/ kun spyod pa shin tu gtsang
331a7('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' bste/ skul sra ba meng po yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing
331b1('bum): bal ltar yang ba rab tu 'thob pa'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing bal ltar shin tu'ang ma pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye bo dang / skye bo phal la byams pas dge sbyong
331b2('bum): chen po bsres pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ro mo zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
331b3('bum): 'das rnams ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gI ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'chab ba ste/ zhal
331b4('bum): cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs brnyan 'jig rten thams cad du bkye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
331b5('bum): 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du gtang zhing 'dul ba sde/ ljags shin tu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin tu srab
331b6('bum): ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa'i skye bo'i 'dod chags pa rnams kyis/ chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas
331b7('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug gi sgra lta bus bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang 'brug gi dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams snyan
332a1('bum): cing 'jam pa dang / nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ snyan cing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
332a2('bum): 'das rnams ni srid pa kun tu sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshoms mche ba rno ba
332a3('bum): dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar ba ste/ tshems mche ba shin tu dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i phyogs
332a4('bum): mnyam pa la bzhugs pa ste/ mtshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba
332a5('bum): rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shes rab kyi ri bo mthon pa la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
332a6('bum): 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ma mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du langs pa mnga' ba ste/
332a7('bum): spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sem
332b1('bum): can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzi ma stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang / mi dang / lA ma yin dang / skyes bu dang / na chang mchog mig dkar gnag 'byes
332b2('bum): shing / pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dga' bar bya ste/ spyan dkar gnag 'byes shing pad+mo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
332b3('bum): rtag tu yangs pa gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs
332b4('bum): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snam gyis sems snum par gyur
332b5('bum): pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin ma snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan pa mnga' ba ste/ stan legs shing stan shal ring ba yin/
332b6('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba
332b7('bum): ste/ snyan gyi dbang po ma nyams pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ zhal 'phral ba legs par grub pa dang ldan pa
333a1('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phas kyis rgol ba shin tu 'dul ba ste/ zhal 'thab langs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
333a2('bum): ni sngon lam dam pa shin tu rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin tu rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu bung ba ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa
333a3('bum): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dag bsgom pas spang ba'i bag la nyal bzang par byas pa ste/ dbu skra stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs
333a4('bum): 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu ma 'dzings pa yin/
333a5('bum): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral ba ste/ dbu mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyi me tog gis/
333a6('bum): skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang / bkra shis dang / dga' bang khyil bas brgyan pa yin
333a7('bum): rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu'o// rab 'byor de ltar de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan
333b1('bum): la bshad pa dang / bstan pa dang / yang dag par bstan pa de ni/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sam
333b2('bum): can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang / chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmad du byung ba'i chos so//
333b3('bum): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya brgyad cu pa/ rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig
333b4('bum): snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i
333b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes
333b6('bum): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di
333b7('bum): ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can
334a1('bum): rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa'
334a2('bum): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med
334a3('bum): de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do// rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems
334a4('bum): can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnam pa sdud do// de ci'i phyir zhe
334a5('bum): na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams
334a6('bum): sdud do// rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmang du byung ba'i chos so// rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
334a7('bum): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'dems shing 'di skad du ston to// rigs kyi bu khyed tshur shog yi
334b1('bum): ge mngon par sgrubs pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig gis byang ba'i rang
334b2('bum): bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/
334b3('bum): yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par sgoms shig ces ston to// rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
334b4('bum): de'ang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi
334b5('bum): ge gcig 'dus par sgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon pa bsgrubs pa la mkhas par bya na/ la la goms shing yi ge med pa mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa yin no// rab 'byor 'di lta
334b6('bum): ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ de chos la mkhas pa dang / yi ge la mkhas pas/ yi ge mang pos
334b7('bum): yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang / rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba'ang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de'ang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar dang rmang du byung ba'i chos te/ gang
335a1('bum): nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom
335a2('bum): ldan 'das gal te mtha' las 'das pa dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin tu mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po'ang mi dmig
335a3('bum): pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha
335a4('bum): rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang / tshad med pa bzhi dang / gzug
335a5('bum): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa dang / byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang / stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / mtshan
335a6('bum): ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang / smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / de bzhin gshegs
335a7('bum): pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang / sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / mi chen po
335b1('bum): mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byang bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing / rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas/ sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la
335b2('bum): ni sems can mi dmigs te/ sems can dudru gdwags pa'ang mo dmigs so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshor ba
335b3('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du shes dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ 'du byed dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
335b4('bum): pas/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
335b5('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ sna dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lce dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
335b6('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ yid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sgra dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
335b7('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ dri dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ro dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ reg dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
336a1('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ chos dmyigs sa ma mchigs// sems can mi dmigs pas// mi rnam par shes pa TIgs sum sa mas/ sams can /
336a2('bum): bas/ na pa'i rnam par shes pa migs sum mchis s+ho// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i rnam par shes pa migs su ma mchis so// sems can ming migs pag gro'i rnam
336a3('bum): par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi rnam par shes par migs sgyu ma mchis so// sems can ming migs pas/ yid kyi rnam par shes
336a4('bum): pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ mig gi 'dus te rig pa du mi gas su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te rag pa dmigs su
336a5('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dmigs su mchis so// sam
336a6('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
336a7('bum): pas mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems
336b1('bum): can mi dmigs pas/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rgyun gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs sum mchis so//
336b2('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dmigs su
336b3('bum): ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sa'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ chu'i khams dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi

337a3('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ rga shi dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
337a4('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
337a5('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so//
337a6('bum): sems can mi dmigs pas/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs
337a7('bum): pas/ phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dmigs/

337b6('bum): pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
337b7('bum): dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dmigs su ma mchis so// sems can mi dmigs pas/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa

339a5('bum): rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// yid kyi rnam par shes pa ma mchis so// mig gi 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so// sna'i 'dus te reg pa ma mchis so//

339b1('bum): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ma mchis so// sa'i khams ma mchis so// chu'i khams ma mchis so// mo'i khams ma mchis so// rlung

340a1('bum): med pa stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rang bzhin stong pa nyid ma mchis so// chos thams cad stong pa nyid ma mchis so// rlung gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ma mchis so//
