370b3('bum): pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/
370b4('bum): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
370b5('bum): pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ yang dag par spong ba rnams kyang gzhan la
370b6('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan
370b7('bum): de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dbang po rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i
371a1('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ stobs rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa
371a2('bum): ma lags/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags
371a3('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
371a4('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ bsam gtan rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
371a5('bum): kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ tshad med pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan//
371a6('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan
371a7('bum): yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan
371b1('bum): pa ma lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhanA/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa sa larbA/
371b2('bum): rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang /
371b3('bum): gnan pa ma lags/ mngon par shes pa rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ ting nge 'dzin
371b4('bum): rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan// yang dag pa'i mtha' yang ga nan pa ma lags/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang
371b5('bum): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa mi legs/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i
371b6('bum): mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ so so yang
371b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ byams pa chen po'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/
372a1('bum): / de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma 'am/ snying rje chen po'ang gzhan la// chos kyi byid kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags
372a2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags bcom ldan 'das gral
372a3('bum): te de ltar rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
372a4('bum): 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'ang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings
372a5('bum): kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ dgra bcom pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang
372a6('bum): dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rang byang chub kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lagasalas
372a7('bum): rnam pa shes pa nyid kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang gzhan la//
372b1('bum): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mtha' yang gzhan pa ma lags na/ 'o nadi ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod cing / nag po'i chos rnams
372b2('bum): kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal ba dang / byol song gi skye gnas dang / gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang / dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi ga
372b3('bum): gnag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar gnag ni bde ba dang / sdug bsngal rnams nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing mi dkar ba'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing mi dkar ba
372b4('bum): ni/ rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
372b5('bum): pa'i byang chub bo zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par
372b6('bum): dgod pa bstan gyi// don dam pa'i bden pas ni 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa bstan par mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ brjod du med pa/ tha snyad med pa
372b7('bum): ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang / gzugs bden pa dang / skye ba med pa dang / 'gag pa med pa dang / kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang / rnam par byang ba med pa ste/ 'di ni mtha' las 'das
373a1('bum): pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par
373a2('bum): dgod pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden par ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang / lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang / phyir mi 'ong
373a3('bum): ba'i 'bras bu dang / dgra bcom pa nyid dang / rang byang chub dang / bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor ci
373a4('bum): byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras
373a5('bum): bu dang / phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam pa dgod par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa
373a6('bum): so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lam rnam par dgod pa'ang med/ lam bsgom pa'ang med pas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa lta ga las 'ong rab
373a7('bum): 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag rnams la ni lam yang yod/ lam bsgom pa'ang yod pas na/ de'i phyir 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa yod do// gsol pa/
373b1('bum): bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ lam bsgom pas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyi ba mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgom
373b2('bum): bas 'bras bu 'thob pa 'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do// rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/ lam gyis 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba'ang med do// lam la ma
373b3('bum): gnas par yang 'bras bu 'thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can
373b4('bum): rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par dgod par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa mi byed do// gsol ba/ bcom ldan
373b5('bum): 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su gcad cing 'bras bu rnam par dgod pa ma mchis na/ bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ni kun tu sbyor ba gsum spangs
373b6('bum): pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang / gnod sems bsrabs pas lan cig phyir bya'i 'bras bu'o// 'og ma'i cha can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong
373b7('bum): ba'i 'bras bu'o// bla ma'i ma can gyi kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do// gang ci rang rung ste/ kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i cha can du shes pas rang byang chub bo//
374a1('bum): bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad sangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub bo zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su gcad cing 'dus
374a2('bum): byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na/ gsungs pa'i don de bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab kyi
374a3('bum): rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang
374a4('bum): chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis
374a5('bum): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su gcad pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji
374a6('bum): snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo la las 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chub par gyur na/
374a7('bum): de'i tshe 'dus byas she 'am/ 'dus ma byas shes chos gang la'ang ris du gcod pa yod dam/ gsol po/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal po rab
374b1('bum): 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong ba nyid dang /
374b2('bum): stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / don dam pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang / thog ma dang
374b3('bum): tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos
374b4('bum): po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la ris su bcad pas chos mi ston to// de bdag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol
374b5('bum): tu phyin pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'am/ shes rab kyi pha
374b6('bum): rol tu phyin pa 'am/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa 'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa 'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa 'am/ byams pa 'am/ snying rje 'am/ dga' ba dang /
374b7('bum): btang snyoms sam/ nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms
375a1('bum): par 'jug pa 'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/
375a2('bum): rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams sam/ 'phags pa'i bden pa
375a3('bum): rnams sam/ bsam gtam rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms
375a4('bum): par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa 'am/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam
375a5('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams sam/ byams pa chen po 'am/ snying rje
375a6('bum): chen po 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sam/ thams cad shes pa nyid dam/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dam/ chos gang la'ang
375a7('bum): mngon par zhen pa med do// de la mngon par zhen pa med pas/ gang la'ang chags pa med do// 'di lta ste/ dper na de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa'i
375b1('bum): 'bras bu la chags pa med/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo // tshul khrim
375b2('bum): srung yang tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du tshul khrim
375b3('bum): srung ngo // bzod pa sgom yang bzod pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bzod pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du
375b4('bum): bzod pa sgom mo// brtson 'grus rtsom yang brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du sems can thams cad yongs su
375b5('bum): mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du brtson 'grus rtsom mo// bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug kyang / bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu nyams su myong
375b6('bum): ba med de/ gzhan du sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du bsam gtan la snyoms par 'jug go// shes rab sgom yang shes rab kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med
375b7('bum): shes rab kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du shes rab sgom mo// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i
376a1('bum): chos rnams sgom yang zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu
376a2('bum): nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'jig rten pa dang /
376a3('bum): 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom yang 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi 'bras
376a4('bum): bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos rnams sgom mo// 'dus byas dang /
376a5('bum): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/
376a6('bum): gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzla ba'i don du 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams yongs su sgom mo// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'
376a7('bum): sems dpa' chen po'ang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi
376b1('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la'ang gnas pa 'am/ chags pa med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi/
376b2('bum): chos kyi mtshan nyid shin tu khong du chud do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa las/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po mngon par bsgrub pa dang / pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa'i
376b3('bum): le'u ste drug cu bzhi'o// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa bam po nyis brgya gyi gnyis pa// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
376b4('bum): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lag/
376b5('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul pa ni 'dod chags dang / zhe sdang dang / gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do// bag la nyal ba dang / kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod
376b6('bum): pa med do// phyi nang gi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi
376b7('bum): chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'du shes la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'du byed la yongs su spyod pa med do//
377a1('bum): rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig la yongs su spyod pa med do// rna ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// sna la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce la yongs su spyod pa med do//
377a2('bum): lus la yongs su spyod pa med do// ling la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// sgra la yongs su spyod pa med do// dri la yongs su spyod pa med do// ro la yongs su
377a3('bum): spyod pa med do// reg la yongs su spyod pa med do// chos la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig gi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//
377a4('bum): sde'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce'i rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi rnam par shes pa la yod
377a5('bum): su spyod pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// sna'i 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce'i 'dus
377a6('bum): te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// mig gi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yo
377a7('bum): su spyod pa med do// rno ba'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// snga'i 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// lce'i 'dus te reg pa las byung
377b1('bum): ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// lus kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// yid kyi 'dus te reg pa las byung ba'i tshor ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// sa'i
377b2('bum): khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// chu'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// me'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rlung gi khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// nam mkha'i khams
377b3('bum): la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par shes pa'i khams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rted cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// ma rig pa la yongs su spyod pa med do//
377b4('bum): byed la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// ming dang gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye mched drug la yongs su spyod pa med do// reg pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshor ba
377b5('bum): la yongs su spyong pa med do// sred pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// len pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// srid pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// skye ba la yongs su spyod pa med do// rga shi la yongs su
377b6('bum): spyod pa med do// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// brtson
377b7('bum): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su spyod pa med do// bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod
378a1('bum): pa med do// phyi stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyi nang stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyong pa med do// chen po stong pa nyid la
378a2('bum): yongs su spyod pa med do// don dam pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// mtha'
378a3('bum): las 'das pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang bzhin stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod
378a4('bum): na pa med do// chos thams cad stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dngos po med pa stong
378a5('bum): pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa
378a6('bum): med do// yang dag par spong ba rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// dbang po rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// stobs rnams la yongs su spyod
378a7('bum): pa med do// byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la yongs su spyod pa med do// 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do//
378b1('bum): bsam gtan rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// tshad med pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par thar pa brgyad
378b2('bum): la yongs su spyong pa med do// mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la yongs su
378b3('bum): spyod pa med do// mngon par shes pa rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// ting nge 'dzin rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// gzungs kyi sgo rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do// de bzhin gshegs
378b4('bum): ba'i stobs bcu la yongs su spyod pa med do// mi 'jigs pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa med do// so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la yongs su spyod pa med do// byams pa chen po la yongs su spyod/
378b5('bum): ba med do// snying rje chen po la yongs su spyod pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do// lan cig
378b6('bum): phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la yongs su spyod pa med do// dgra bcom pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rang byang chub la yongs su spyod pa med do//
378b7('bum): lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang
379a1('bum): chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa sa
379a2('bum): yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgom pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs pa med par yang mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar yang mi 'gyur la/ 'gro balnga
379a3('bum): 'khor ba na'ang mi gda' na/ lam bsgom bu ci mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/
379a4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
379a5('bum): de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la zhig la len te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba 'am/
379a6('bum): ba lnga'i 'khor ba na gangar bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu'ang ma mchis so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos
379a7('bum): rnams kyi chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci lags gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam
379b1('bum): 'du shes thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ 'du byed thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
379b2('bum): rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// tshor ba thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// 'du shes thams cad ni spel pa lta bu'o// 'du byed thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// rnam par shes pa
379b3('bum): thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ 'du shes thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu/ 'du byed
379b4('bum): thams cad sprul pa lta bu/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sbal pa la ni gzugs ma mchis tshur ba ma mchis/ 'du shes ma mchis
379b5('bum): 'du byed ma mchis/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las 'grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba ma mchis na/ ji ltar
379b6('bum): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i mthur 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems
379b7('bum): dba'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshesems can dmyal ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am/ mi dag las yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang
380a1('bum): dmigs samagasol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no// de de bzhin te/ byang chub
380a2('bum): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des ni chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bur shes so//
380a3('bum): mthong ngo // rtogs so// sprul pa lta bur shes so// mthong ngo // rtogs so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad
380a4('bum): rgyu ma lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal cing mthong ste rtogs pa lags na/ gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa
380a5('bum): lags/ bsam gtan bzhi la spyod pa lags/ tshad med pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ mngon par shes pa lnga la spyod pa lags/ byang
380a6('bum): chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa lags/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la spyod pa lags/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la spyod pa
380a7('bum): lags/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la spyod pa lags// ting nge 'dzin thams cad la spyod pa lags/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la spyod pa lags/ de bzhin
380b1('bum): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la spyod pa lags/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la spyod pa lags/ byams pa chen po la spyod pa lags/ snying rje chen po la spyod pa lags/
380b2('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa lags/ de ci'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi lam gyi bar la spyod pa lags/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par
380b3('bum): bgyid pa dang / sems can rnams yongs su smin par bgyid pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te sems can rnams rang rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta
380b4('bum): bur shes su zin na ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang sems can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med par byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa mi spyod de/ rab 'byor sems can rnams rang
380b5('bum): rang gis chos thams cad sprul pa lta bur mi shes pas/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bskal pa grangs med par pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod do// sems can rnams yongs su
380b6('bum): smin par byed do// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu/ sgra brnyan lta bu/ sreg chu lta bu/ mig lor lta bu/
380b7('bum): sgyu ba lta bu/ sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can rnams ci la gnas na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / sems can
381a1('bum): rnams gyen du spyod par bgyid/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor sems can rnams ni ming dang mtshan ma yang dag pa ma yin par yongs su brtags pa la gnas ngas
381a2('bum): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing / de dag ming dang mtshan ma las gyen du spyod do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ming ni gang lags/ mtshan ma ni gang
381a3('bum): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste/ ming zhes bya ba'am/ mtshan ma zhes bya ba 'di ni glo bur gyi ming gi slo btags pa'o// 'di lta ste/ maung zhes bya ba'am/
381a4('bum): mtshan ma zhes bya ba'am/ gzugs shes bya ba 'am/ tshor ba zhes bya ba 'am/ 'du shes shes bya ba 'am/ 'du byed ces bya ba 'am/ rnam par shes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ bud med ces bya ba
381a5('bum): 'am/ skyes pa zhes bya ba 'am/ lde'u zhes bya ba 'am/ bu mo zhes bya ba 'am/ sems can dmyal ba zhes bya ba 'am/ byol song gi skye gnas shes bya ba'am/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa zhes
381a6('bum): bya ba 'am/ lha zhes bya ba 'am/ mi zhes bya ba 'am/ 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos shes bya ba 'am rgyun du zhugs
381a7('bum): pa'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba'am/ byer mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu zhes bya ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'am/ rang byang chub ces bya ba 'am
381b1('bum): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ces bya ba 'di ni sgyu ma'i ming gis sgo btag pa ste/ rab 'byor ning ni thams cad ming gi don gyis btags pa ste/ byis pas so'i skye po rnams gang la chags pa
381b2('bum): ba'i 'dus byas thams cad ni ming tsam ste/ de dag la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas ming thams cad ni yongs
381b3('bum): su rtogs pa las byung ba yin gyis/ yongs su brtags pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa la khyed chags par ma byed cig/ chos thams cad stong pa la mkhas pa rnams ni mngon par zhen
381b4('bum): bar mi byed do zhes skul pa byed de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams la chos
381b5('bum): ston pa yin no// rab 'byor mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gnyis po 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams gang la chags par 'gyur ba'i mtshan ma ste/ gnyis gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs
381b6('bum): kyi mtshan ma dang / gzugs med pa'i mtshan ma'o// rab 'byor gzugs kyi mtshan ma gang zhe na/ 'das pa dang / ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba'i gzugs rags pa 'am/ phra ba 'am
381b7('bum): bzang ba 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ rgyang ring ba 'am/ thag nye ba gang chos thams cad skad cig ma la kun tu rtog pas bzung ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs kyi mtshan ma zhes bya'o// rab 'byor gzugs med pa'i/
382a1('bum): mtshan ma gang zhe na/ gzugs med pa'i chos gang yang rung ste/ mtshan mar bzung bas yongs su brtags shing / nyon mongs pa skye bar 'gyur ba ste/ 'di ni gzugs med pa'i
382a2('bum): mtshan ma zhes bya'o// de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas mtshan ma de dag las bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i//
382a3('bum): dbyings su 'god cing rab tu gzhag ste/ ci nas kyang 'di ni mtshan ma'o// 'di ni mtshan ma med pa'o// zhes bya ba gnyis su mi lhung ba de ltar dgod cing gzhog ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
382a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams mtshan ma las rnam par bkrol zhing / mtshan ma med pa'i dbyings su rab tu
382a5('bum): 'god do// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te chos 'di dag thams cad ni ming dang mtshan ma tsam du bas te/ ming dang mtshan mar bas la/ btags pa tsam du byas te/
382a6('bum): yongs su brtags pa las byung ba lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ bdag kyang dge ba'i chos kyi byad/
382a7('bum): bar 'thob la/ gzhan yang dge ba'i chos kyi khyad par 'thob pa la gzhog cing / dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag gis sa nas sa yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pa lags/ sems can rnams theg pa gsum la sbyor
382b1('bum): ba lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gal te dngos po 'am/ dngos po'i mtshan ma zhig yod na ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
382b2('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ khyad par thob par yang mi 'gyur te/ gzhan yang khyad par thob pa la sbyor bar mi 'gyur gyis/ 'di ltar dngos po'i mtshan ma'ang med/ dngos po'ang med pas na rab
382b3('bum): 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
382b4('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
382b5('bum): gyis tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis bsam gtan
382b6('bum): bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis tshad med pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi yongs
382b7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par spong ba bzhi yongs su rdzogs par
383a1('bum): byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dbang po lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
383a2('bum): mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stobs lnga yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byang chub kyi yan lag bdun yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags
383a3('bum): ba'i lam ldan lag brgyad pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par
383a4('bum): byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis phyi nang stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i
383a5('bum): tshul gyis chen po stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis don dam pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus byas stong
383a6('bum): pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid yongs
383a7('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dor ba med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs
383b1('bum): bar byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rang bzhinam stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtsham ma med pa'i tshul gyis chos thams cad stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan pa
383b2('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
383b3('bum): gyis dngos po med pa stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis dngos po med pa'i
383b4('bum): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par thar pa brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mthar gyis gnas pa'i
383b5('bum): snyoms par 'jug pa dgu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis rnam par
383b6('bum): thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mngon par shes pa rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do//
383b7('bum): mtsham ma med pa'i tshul gyis ting nge 'dzin rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis gzungs kyi sgo rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis
384a1('bum): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis mi 'jigs pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul
384a2('bum): gyis so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis byams pa chen po yongs su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis snying rje chen po yongs
384a3('bum): su rdzogs par byed do// mtshan ma med pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad yongs su rdzogs par byed do// de dge ba'i chos de dag yongs su rdzogs par byas nas/ mtshan ma
384a4('bum): med pa'i tshul gyis gzhan yang dge ba'i chos de dag la sbyor te/ rab 'byor gal te chung ngu na skra'i rtse mo'i cha shas gzhag pa tsam gyi khyon gcig gi mtshan ma yod na yang byang chub sems dpa'
384a5('bum): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad mtshan ma med pa/ dran pa med pa/ yid la byed pa med pa de mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur te/ sems
384a6('bum): can rnams kyang de bzhin nyid dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la gzhog par mi 'gyur ro// rab 'byor zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa dran pa med pa/ yid la bya
384a7('bum): ba med pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe zag pa med pa'i chos rnams kyis sems can thams cad
384b1('bum): kyidod byed do// gsol pa/ yom ma dus ka de myur chos pam snang sadun mAm pa nim byeng / dran pa mam+b+ha sa twA/ 'a sa bgyib la mi na/ cos su
384b2('bum): 'di ltar 'di dag ni dge ba'i rlom mo// 'di dag ni mi dge ba'i rgyam so// 'di dag ni 'jig rten pa'i rnam sa/ 'di dag 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos so// 'du gan
384b3('bum): zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos so// 'di dag ni 'dus byas kyi chom so// 'di dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos so// 'di dku ni thun mong gro
384b4('bum): 'di dag ni phun mong ma yin pa'i tsas so// 'di dag ni nyan thos kyi chos so// 'di dag ni rang sangs rgyas kyi chos so// 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa thom so// 'dedag ni
384b5('bum): sangs rgyas kyi chos so zhes bgyi bar ji ltar bgrang bar bgyi bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' sprul pa rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ nyan thos kyi
384b6('bum): chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems mtshan ma med pa
384b7('bum): gzhan la/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnams kyang gzhan nam/ mtshan ma med pa'ang gzhan la/ sangs
385a1('bum): rgyas kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan num/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor mtshan ma med pa
385a2('bum): nyid rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o// lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o// dgra bcom pa nyid do// rang byang chub bo// byang chub sems dpa'i
385a3('bum): chos so// sangs rgyas kyi chos so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de de lags so// bde bar gshegs pade de lags so// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
385a4('bum): rab 'byor rnam grangs des na 'di ltar chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med par rig par bya ste/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ni mtshan ma med pa 'di la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems
385a5('bum): dpa' chen po ni dge ba'i chos mang pos rnam par 'phel te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang / tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
385a6('bum): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang / nang stong pa nyid dang / phyi stong pa nyid dang / byi nang stong pa
385a7('bum): nyid dang / stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang / chen po stong pa nyid dang / donangs pa stong pa nyid dang / 'dus byas stong pa nyid dang / 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang / mtha' las 'das pa stong pa
385b1('bum): nyid dang / thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang / dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang / rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang / chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang / rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa
385b2('bum): nyid dang / mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang / ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang / dran pa nye bar
385b3('bum): gzhag pa bzhi dang / yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang / dbang po lnga dang / stobs lnga dang / byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang 'phags
385b4('bum): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang / 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang / bsam gtan bzhi dang tshad med pa bzhi dang gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi
385b5('bum): dang / rnam par thar pa brgyad dang / mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang / rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa dang /
385b6('bum): mngon par shes pa lnga dang / ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang / gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang / de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang / mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang / so so yang
385b7('bum): dag par rig pa bzhi dang / byams pa chen po dang / snying rje chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang / de ma yin pa'i sangs rgyas chos dpag tu med pa
386a1('bum): dag gis rnam par 'phel lo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni stong pa nyid dang / mtsham ma med pa dang /
386a2('bum): smon pa med pa la bslab par bya ba ma gtogs par gzhan la bslab par bya ba med do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo 'di gsum du dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/
386a3('bum): 'di ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid ni stong pa nyid rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mtshan ma dang bral ba ni mtshan ma med pa rnam par thar pa'i sgo'o// mngon par 'du bya ba med pa ni smon pa
386a4('bum): med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo ste rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum po 'dri la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni phung po lnga la slob pa yin/ skye mched bcu gnyis
386a5('bum): la slob pa yin/ khams bco brgyad la slob pa yin/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis la slob pa yin/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin
386a6('bum): tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan gyi pha
386a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa yin/ nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
386b1('bum): stong ba nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chen po stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ don dam pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la slob pa yin 'dus ma byas spong ba
386b2('bum): nyid la slob pa yin mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin
386b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/
386b4('bum): dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la slob pa yin/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la slob pa
386b5('bum): yin/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi la slob pa yin/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ dbang po lnga la slob pa yin/ stobs lnga la slob pa yin byang chub kyi yan
386b6('bum): lag bdun la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la slob pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ bsam gtan bzhi la slob pa yin/
386b7('bum): tshad med pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la slob pa yin/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
387a1('bum): dgu la slob pa yin/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la skyob pa yin/ mngon par shes pa lnga la slob pa yin
387a2('bum): ting nge 'dzin thams cad la slob pa yin/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la slob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la slob pa yin/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi la slob pa yin
387a3('bum): so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la slob pa yin byams pa chen po la slob pa yin snying rje chen po la slob pa yin sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la slob pa yin/
387a4('bum): thams cad shes pa nyid la slob pa yin lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid la slob pa yin rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la slob pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/
387a5('bum): bcom ldan 'das rnam pa gang gi tshul du ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga la slob pa lags
387a6('bum): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs rab tu shes te gzugs
387a7('bum): ji ltar skye ba dang / gzugs ji ltar 'gag pa dang gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ji lta bu yin pa rab tu shes so// de la ji ltar ma gzugs shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na
387b1('bum): dgu ba'i phung po snying po med pa ltar/ shin tu gsong ldong dang shin tu bse tshags dang / shin tu snying po med par rab tu shes te/ de ltar na gzugs shes pa yin no//
387b2('bum): ji ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes yin ce na gzugs ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mI 'ong / gang
387b3('bum): du'ang mi 'gro ba ste ga gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na gzugs kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa
387b4('bum): yin zhen// gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin
387b5('bum): te/ phyi ma ci log ma yin ning de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na gzugs kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba shes pa yim ne na/
387b6('bum): 'dri lta ste/ dper ma chu'i chu bur gsog tu 'dug pa skye zhing 'gag pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na tshor ba shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor
387b7('bum): ba ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang mi 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste
388a1('bum): ltar na tshor ba'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye/ mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med
388a2('bum): 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir
388a3('bum): de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na tshor ba'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na smig rgyu la chu shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa
388a4('bum): ste de ltar na 'du shes shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi
388a5('bum): 'ong / gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang du'ang ma song bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du shes kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin
388a6('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'brib ma yin 'phel
388a7('bum): ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma zhing / de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du shes kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed shes pa
388b1('bum): yin zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dper na chu shing shun pa so sor phye na snying po shin tu mi dmigs pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na 'du byed shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin na na/
388b2('bum): 'du byed ni gang nas kyang 'ong ba med cing / gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang durangam song bar shes pa ste/
388b3('bum): de ltar na 'du byed kyi skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi skye mi 'gag/ 'ong ba med/ 'gro ba med/
388b4('bum): kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin rnam par byang ba ma yin 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin
388b5('bum): nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na 'du byed kyi de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin zhe na/ 'dri lta ste/ dper na sgyu ma byed pas sprul pa'i dpung gi tshogs lan
388b6('bum): lag bzhi pa ltar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rnam par shes pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa ni gang nas
388b7('bum): kyang 'ong ba med cing gang du'ang 'gro ba med pas/ gang nas kyang mi 'ong gang du'ang mi 'gro ba ste/ gang gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de gang durang ma song bar shes pa ste
389a1('bum): de ni rnam par shes pa'i skye ba dang 'jig pa shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid ni mi skye
389a2('bum): mi 'gag/ 'ong ba meda'agro ba med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin/ rnam par byang ba ma yin/ 'bri ba ma yin/ 'phel ba ma yin te/ phyin ci log ma yin zhing de bzhin nyid
389a3('bum): du gnas pa ste/ de'i phyir de bzhin nyid ces bya'o// de ltar na rnam par shes pa'i de bzhin nyid shes pa yin no// ji ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ nang gi chos rnams ni nang gi
389a4('bum): chos rnams kyis stong / phyi'i chos rnams kyang phyi'i chos rnams kyis stong par shes pa ste/ de ltar na skye mched rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ mig gi
389a5('bum): khams kyang mig gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis spong ngo // gzugs kyi khams kyang gzugs kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang mig gi rnam
389a6('bum): par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // rna ba'i khams kyang rna ba'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // spa'i khams kyang sgra'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
389a7('bum): rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // snga'i khams kyang sna'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // dri'i khams kyang dri'i
389b1('bum): khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i khams kyang lce'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo //
389b2('bum): ro'i khams kyang ro'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis skyong ngo // lus kyi khams kyang lus kyi khams
389b3('bum): kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // reg gi khams kyang reg gi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong
389b4('bum): ngo // yid kyi khams kyang yid kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // chos kyi khams kyang chos kyi khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo // yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang yid kyi rnam par
389b5('bum): shes pa'i khams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ngo zhes bya bar shes te de ltar na khams rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin zhe na/ rten cing 'brel
389b6('bum): bar 'byung ba skye ba med par shes pa dang / de bzhin du rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba 'gag pa med pa dang / chad pa med pa dang / rtag pa med pa dang don gcig pa ma yin pa
389b7('bum): dang / don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang / 'ong ba med pa dang / 'gro ba med pa dang / spros pa dang bral zhing zhi bar shes pa ste/ de ltar na rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba shes pa yin no//
390a1('bum): ji ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin/ kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i
390a2('bum): lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ ji ltar na sdug bsngal 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal shes pa yin/ bden pa shes pa yin/ 'phags pa'i bden pa shes
390a3('bum): ba yin/ gnyis las rnam par grol ba 'phags pa'i bden pa ste/ gnyis su med pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa zhes bya bar shes pa yin no// de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang /
390a4('bum): 'gog pa dang / 'gog par 'gro ba'i lam 'phags pa'i bden pa shes pa yin te/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams shes pa yin no// ji ltar na sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin
390a5('bum): nyid shes pa yin zhe na/ sdug bsngal gyi de bzhin nyid ni ma nor ba zhes bya bar shes pa yin/ de bzhin du kun 'byung ba dang / 'gog pa dang / lam gyi de bzhin nyid kyang rab tu
390a6('bum): shes pa yin/ de ltar na 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams kyi de bzhin nyid ni shes pa yin no// de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
390a7('bum): gsol to// bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ phan tshun pa dad pa'i chos de dag de ltar 'tshal na
390b1('bum): des chos kyi dbyings rnam par dkrug par mi 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor gal te chos kyi dbyings ma gtogs pa'i chos la la zhig yod na ni rnam par dathug par yang
390b2('bum): 'gyur te// rab 'byor gyi chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan gang yang mi dmigs so// gal te dmigs na ni chos kyi dbyings kyang rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur ro// de ci'i phyir zhe na/
390b3('bum): rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa 'am/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyis chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gang yang mi
390b4('bum): dmigs so// de ltar mi dmigs pas chos kyi dbyings su ma gtogs pa'i chos gzhan no zhes bya bar btags pa med do// rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
390b5('bum): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos kyi dbyings la bslab par bya'o// rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi dbyings la slob pas/
390b6('bum): gang la bsgrub par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur
390b7('bum): te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar chos thams cad ni chos kyi dbyings so// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ chos thams cad chos dbyings lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
391a1('bum): bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams byung yang rung ma byung yang rung ste/ dbyer med pa'i tshul gyis chos rnams kyi chos kyi dbyings ni de bzhin du gnas pa
391a2('bum): ste/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings de ni/ 'di lta ste/ dge ba dang / mi dge ba'i chos dang / 'jig rten pa dang / 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang / zag pa dang bcas pa dang / zag pa med
391a3('bum): pa'i chos dang / kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang / kha na ma tho ba med pa'i chos dang / 'dus byas dang / 'dus ma byas kyi chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems
391a4('bum): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa chos kyi dbyings la slob pas chos thams cad la bslabs par 'gyur ro// gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te
391a5('bum): chos thams cad chos kyi dbyings lags na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ji ltar gzugs la bslab par bgyiji ltar tshor ba
391a6('bum): la bslab par bgyi ji ltar 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khams dang / skye mched rnams
391a7('bum): dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
391b1('bum): bslab par bgyi ji ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bsgrub par
391b2('bum): bgyi/ ji ltar nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stong pa nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi
391b3('bum): ji ltar chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar don dam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'dus ma byas stong pa nyid la bslab
391b4('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang
391b5('bum): bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
391b6('bum): ji ltar dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi la
391b7('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar yang dag par spong ba bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dbang po lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar stobs lnga la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
392a1('bum): byang chub kyi yan lag bdun la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
392a2('bum): bsam gtan bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab
392a3('bum): bar bgyi/ ji ltar mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang / mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar
392a4('bum): mngon par shes pa drug la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar ting nge 'dzin thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
392a5('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi 'jigs pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snying rje chen po
392a6('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dga' ba chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar btang snyoms chen po la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcwo brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mi
392a7('bum): chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su 'grub par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal rigs che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab pa kyi/
392b1('bum): ji ltar bram ze che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar khyim bdag che zhing mtho ba'i rigs su skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lhar byebs kyi/
392b2('bum): la bathab par bgyi/ ji ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar mtshe ma'i lhar skye bar dgyi ba la bslab par 'gyi/ ji ltar dga' ldan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
392b3('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar 'phrul dga'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
392b4('bum): par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs la nye phan gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs pa kun 'khor gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshangs chen gyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la
392b5('bum): bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rlung snang gi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med snang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
392b6('bum): bar bgyi/ ji ltar kun snang dang ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung dge'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji
392b7('bum): ltar tshad med dge ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar dge rgyas kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar chung che'i lhan
393a1('bum): skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar tshad med che ba'i lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'bras bu che ba'i lha skye bar bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes
393a2('bum): med pa'i sems can du skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar gnas gtsang ma'i ris kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bsgrub cing der yang mi skye bar bgyitshe/ ji ltar nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar
393a3('bum): skye bar gyi bal bslab cing de yang mi skye bas kyi/ ji ltar rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab
393a4('bum): cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi lhar skye bar bgyi ba la bslab cing der yang mi skye bar bgyi/ ji ltar sems dang po bskyed pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems
393a5('bum): bskyed pa gnyis pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa gsum pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bzhi pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa lnga pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji
393a6('bum): ltar sems bskyed pa drug pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa bdun pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa brgyad pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sems bskyed pa dgu pa la bslab par gyi/
393a7('bum): ji ltar sems bskyed pa bcu pa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan thos kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar rang sangs rgyas kyi sa la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i skyon ma mchis pa la bslab par bgyi/
393b1('bum): ji ltang sems can 'ongs su smin par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba la bslab par bgyi/ ji ltar byang drub kyi la ma la bslab cing / chos thams cad rnab pa thams cad du
393b2('bum): 'tshal bar bgyi ba'i byang chub kyi lam la slob par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ gzugs la
393b3('bum): bslab par bgyi/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ 'du shes la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba la bslab pasagyi/
393b4('bum): sna la bslab par bgyi/ lce la bslab par bgyi/ lus la bslab par bgyi/ yid la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ sba la bslab par bgyi/ dril bslab par bgyi/ rol
393b5('bum): bslab par bgyi/ reg la bslab par bgyi/ chos la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i rnam par shes pa la bslab
393b6('bum): par bgyi/ lce'i rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus
393b7('bum): te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa la bslabapar bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la bslab par bgyi/ mig gi 'dus
394a1('bum): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis ror ba la bslab par bgyi/ lce'i/
394a2('bum): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sa'i kham
394a3('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ chu'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ me'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rlung gi khams la bslab par bgyi/ nam mkha'i khams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa'i khams la bslab par
394a4('bum): bgyi/ ma rig pa la bslab par bgyi/ 'du byed la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par shes pa la bslab par bgyi/ ming dang gzugs la bslab par bgyi/ skye mched drug la bslab par bgyi/ reg pa la bslab par
394a5('bum): bgyid/ tshor ba la bslab par bgyi/ sred pa la bslab par bgyi/ len pa la bslab par bgyi/ srid pa la bslab par bgyi/ skye ba la bslab par bgyi/ rga shi la bslab par bgyi/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
394a6('bum): la bslab par bgyi/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan gyis
394a7('bum): rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bgyi/ nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ phyi nang stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ stong
394b1('bum): ba nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chen po stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ donangam pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus byas stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ 'dus ma byas stong pa
394b2('bum): nyid la bslab par bgyi/ mtha' las 'das pa stong ba nyid la bslab par bgyi/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid la bskyab par bgyi/ dor ba med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/
394b3('bum): rang bzhin stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ chos thams cad stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid la
394b4('bum): bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid la bslab par bgyi
394b5('bum): dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la bslab par bgyi yang dag par spong ba rnams la bslab par bgyi rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams la bslab par bgyi dbang po rnams
394b6('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi/ stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams la bslab par bgyi/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la bslab par
394b7('bum): bgyi/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ bsam gtan rnams la bslab par bgyi/ tshad med pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
395a1('bum): 'jug pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar pa brgyad la bslab par bgyi/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu la bslab par bgyi/ rnam par thar ba'i
395a2('bum): zho stong pa nyid dang mtshan ma med pa dang / smon pa med pa la bslab par bgyi/ mngon par shes pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ ting nge 'dzin rnams la bslab par bgyi
395a3('bum): gzungs kyi sgo rnams la bslab par bgyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams la bslab par bgyi mi 'jigs pa rnams la bslab par bgyi so so yang dag par rig pa
395a4('bum): rnams la bslab par bgyi byams pa chen po la bslab par bgyi snying rje chen po la bslab par bgyi sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams la bslab par bgyi/ rgyun du
395a5('bum): zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bslab par bgyi/ dgra bcom pa nyid la bslab par bgyi
395a6('bum): rang byang chub la bslab par bgyi/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
395a7('bum): chen po phyin ci log la spyod pa 'amami spro ba spros par bgyid par mi 'gyur lags grang //
